GSP33bbdip13u:2: tatra cānyatra ca prasiddhānāṃ śabdānāṃ viṣṇau samanvayaṃ prāyeṇāsmin pāde darśayati /
GSP33bbdip13u:10: rudraprakṛtyādau ca śrutiliṅgādibhiḥ prasiddhānāṃ nāmaliṅgātmakaśabdānāṃ viṣṇau 'samanvayaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:14: tatra 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam';
GSP33bbdip13u:28: tathā ca adṛśyatvādiguṇakākṣarasya viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvaṃ yatroktaṃ tatraivātharvaṇe tatparavidyāviṣayatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:29: yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:32: ityatra iti vākye tatra dyubhvādyāśraye uktamityekā yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:37: na ca prāṇādhāratvaśravaṇe 'pi kuto 'tra rudrasya prāptiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:40: yo brahmā brahmaṇa ujjabhāra prāṇeśvaraḥ kṛttivāsāḥ pinākīr /
GSP33bbdip13u:42: ityādikhilasaṃhitāvākyena ca rudrasya prāṇādhāratvapratīteḥ ityaparā yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:43: yadvā - asminneva pakṣe tayorityetatsaptamyantamāśritya liṅgaliṅgirūpadharmadvayaparatayā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:51: prādhānyena jñeyatvarūpasya vā paravidyāviṣayatvasya pūrvoktasya viṣṇoritaratvākṣepāt
GSP33bbdip13u:62: rudra u mā āviśa iti padacchedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:74: yadvā - he rudra antakastvaṃ māṃ mā praviśetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:100: svetiśabdaḥ svaśabda iti vyutpattyā svaśabdaparyāyātmaśabdagrāhitvaṃ viṣṇoḥ svarūpasyaiva sākṣādvācako hyayamātmaśabda iti tattvapradīpokteḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:101: svasya viṣṇoreva vācakaḥ śabdaḥ svaśabda iti vigrahāśrayeṇa ca ātmaśabdaparāmarśitvamāśritya svaśabdādityetadātmaśabdāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:126: nanu viṣṇau mukhyo 'pyātmaśabdo jāyamānatvarūpajīvaliṅgabalādamukhyārthaḥ kiṃ na syāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:127: tathā ca na tato viṣṇordyubhvādyāyatanatvanirṇaya ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya tadupāttaśrutimevādāharati - mukteti //
GSP33bbdip13u:131: upasṛpyatvaṃ ceha śrautasetuśabdabalātprāpyāntararahitatve sati prāpyatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:150: nanu dyubhvādyāyatanasya muktaprāpyatvaṃ kutaḥ viṣṇutvaniścāyakamityāśaṅkāparihārakatayāpi sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - brahmaviditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:152: viṣṇoḥ evetyanena prāpyatvaṃ prāpyāntararahitatve sati prāptatvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:153: anena dyubhvādyāyatanasya muktopasṛpyatvavyapadeśāttasya viṣṇoreva muktopasṛtapyatvavyapadeśādityāvṛttyā sūtraṃ vyākhyātam/
GSP33bbdip13u:179: idamidaṃ ceti pratyekaṃ bahunā vacanena 'kiṃ prayojanaṃ'; na kimapi,
GSP33bbdip13u:181: tarhi kathaṃ nirṇaya ityata āha - yāvacchvetamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:191: bhāvabodhe tu - sūtre purāṇe ca muktapadena liṅgabhaṅgavān vivakṣita ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:192: atra śvetadvīpāganturamuktatvoktyā śvetadvīpaṃ prāptasyaiva muktatvaṃ jñāyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:193: tathā ca tatsthitasya viṣṇorevetaravyavacchedena muktaprāpyatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:202: nanu prāguktarītyā rudraprakṛtyordyubhvāyatanatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityatastatsādhakābhāvānna tayostadityāha sūtrakṛt - nānumānamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:205: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ anumānātmake anumānasiddhaprāmāṇyake pāśupatādyāgame sarvāśrayatvena kalpito bodhita ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:215: evaṃ sūtre pratijñāṃśaṃ vyākhyāya hetvaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - bhasmadhareti //
GSP33bbdip13u:226: tathā ca - bhasmadharādirudraśrutīnām ugratvādirūpatalliṅgānāṃ rudraprāpakasamākhyādīnāṃ cābhāvādityartha ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:227: atra rudraśivāditacchabdābhāvādityanuktvā bhasmadharogratvādīti vacanaṃ 'rudro bhasmadharo nagnaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:229: ata evaitadvacanoktāḥ nagnādiśabdā evādipadena grāhyā iti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:236: iti sattarkadīpāvalyukterānumānamiti padacchedenānumānaśabdena vā anumānasiddhaprāmāṇyakapāśupatādyāgamasiddhaṃ rudrapradhānādhikaṃ gṛhyate
GSP33bbdip13u:243: tathā ca anumānātmakapāśupatādyāgamapratipādyaṃ rudrādikaṃ na dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na 'yasmin';
GSP33bbdip13u:247: 'so 'ntakaḥ sa rudraḥ sa prāṇabhṛtsa prāṇanāyakaḥ sar iśo yo hariryo 'nanto yo viṣṇuryaḥ parovarīyān';
GSP33bbdip13u:250: ityādisamākhyāśrutau rudrādiśabdānām antakatvādiliṅgānāṃ coktatvāttadbalāttatroktaṃ dyubhvādyātanatvaṃ rudrādeḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - sa iti
GSP33bbdip13u:251: yo 'ntakassaṃhartā sa eva tacchabdavācyaḥ śrutaḥ sa viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip13u:257: tatsvāmī tata eva prāṇeśa śabditaḥ so 'pi viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip13u:260: yaḥ parovarīyān so 'pi rudrādeḥ parato vāṇyādeḥ parādviriñcāt parataḥ prakṛteḥ paratvāddharireva nānya iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:262: iti vacanānusāreṇa paraparataravaravaratamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pratyāyanāya vṛttivākye subādeśasya sorutvotvaguṇasamānaśabdalopā jñātavyāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:276: tadādhāro yato viṣṇuḥ pinākīti tataḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSP33bbdip13u:282: tatratyānāṃ rudrādiśabdānāṃ paśupatyādāveva rūḍhatvena viṣṇau tadabhāvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:285: na hi śrutyantare viṣṇuliṅgādyastītyata āha - brahmāṇḍe ceti /
GSP33bbdip13u:289: kimuktamityato rudrādiśabdānāṃ mahāyogavidvadrūḍhipratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ paṭhati - rujamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:306: muktiparyantaṃ svarūpabhūtamapi sukhaṃ rudhvā vartanāt āsurasakhaṃ nirudhya vartanādvā śarva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:309: sṛjan niyamayan vā tena svātmānaṃ jīvaṃ vā 'vaste';
GSP33bbdip13u:311: yadvā - dehaṃ vaste adhivasatītyataḥ kṛttivāsā ityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:316: evaṃ viṣṇau rudrādiśabdānāṃ mahāyogamuktvā vidvadrūḍhiṃ cāha - evamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:319: uktarītyā nānāvidhairnimitaiḥ sapurāṇeṣu vedeṣu gataiḥ etairnānāvidhaiḥ śabdairviṣṇureka eva 'gīyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:325: tathā cānena viṣṇau rudrādiśabdānāṃ mahāyogavidvadrūḍhikathanāt tayośta rūḍhimātrātprābalyādyuktaḥ samākhyāśrutyantare 'pi viṣṇoḥ pratipādyatvaniścaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:331: anyanāmnāṃ gatirviṣṇuḥ eka eva prakīrtitaḥ // iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:335: ityādiśrutīnāmanirṇāyakatvaṃ ca syādityata āha - vāmane ceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:341: nārāyaṇa ityādīnamanyatra rudrādau sambhavo mukhyavṛttiḥ astīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:346: tasya nārāyaṇādināmnāṃ anyatra niravakāśatvokteḥ na tacchrutīnāmanirṇāyakatvamiti vivakṣitasādhyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:349: prādādanyatra bhagavān rājevarte svakaṃ puram // iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:350: bhagavannāmatvāviśeṣādrudrādināmavannārāyaṇādināmnāmapi rudrādau vṛttiḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - skānde ceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:358: yathā rājā svakaṃ puramṛte 'nyadamātyādibhyo dadāti tadvadityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:361: anena skānde nārāyaṇādināmnāṃ viṣṇorevoktatvānna sāmyamityanvayena pūrvaprayuktaivakārasya kṛtyāntaraṃ sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:363: ugro bhasmadharo nagnaḥ kapālīti śivasya ca /
GSP33bbdip13u:366: yadyevaṃ rudrādiśabdāḥ viṣṇvaikaparāḥ tarhi kimucyate bhasmadharogratvādīnāṃ tacchabdatvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:367: viṣṇudattatvābhiprāyeṇa cet - tarhi rudrādiśabdā api tādṛśā iti kathaṃ tairnirṇayābhāva ityata āha - caturmukha iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:386: viṣayabhūtalokādhāratvasya 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti'; (bṛ. 5-7-2.)
GSP33bbdip13u:387: iti śrutyantare vāyuniṣṭhatvena prasiddhatvādvāyorvātra prakaraṇe dyubhvādyāśrayatvena pratipādyatā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - prāṇabhṛcceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:394: anena sūtre caśabdaḥ prāguktahetūnāṃ nānumānamityato nañaśca samākarṣakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:400: ityādiśruterviṣṇuparatvena vāyusādhakatvābhāve 'pi bahudhā janmākhyaliṅgena jīvo 'tra vācyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - ajāyamāna iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:407: yasya janmāsambhavo 'bhihitaḥ pūrvavādinā tasyaiva viṣmorna jīvasyetyevaśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:408: tathā ca liṅgaṃ sāvakāśamiti na tadvirodha iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:418: jīveśābhedābhiprāyeṇa jīve 'pyātmaśabdādyuktisambhavādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:422: sa ca hetugatabhedapratiyoginā saṃyojya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:429: iti darśanakartṛtvena prakṛtajīvasyar iśapadokteścar iśvarādbhedokteḥ na tayoraikyamatrābhipretamiti vācyamiti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:438: ato na tayorbheda ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - prakaraṇāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:445: iti paravidyāviṣayavastuno 'trādhītatvena viṣṇuprakaraṇatvātparamātmana eva bhedavyapadeśāvagateḥ na jīvaparamātnorabhedo 'trābhipreta iti vācyamiti sūtrayojanā darśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:449: dvāsuparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ bṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GSP33bbdip13u:454: iti bhedaśruterna jīveśabhedo 'tra prakaraṇe vivakṣita iti jñāyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:458: ityatra śrutābhyāḥ karmaphalānupajīvanāvasthititadupajīvanābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ ca naivātra jīveśayoraikyaṃ vācyamiti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:460: śrutāvadanasya prāthamye 'pi sthiterīśasambandhitvenābhyarhitatvādalpākṣaratvācca sūtre tadanusāreṇa bhāṣye ca śrautakramamullaṅghya sthiteḥ prathamamuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:478: na tu svasthityai jīvavatkarmaphalamapekṣata iti muṇḍakaśrutyarthaḥ // 1 //
GSP33bbdip13u:488: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati - prāṇa iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:500: tasya janimātrārthatve tu na tena sa ucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:502: ityādinā ayaṃ prāṇo viṣṇurityabhyupetya vādena bhāṣyaṃ pravṛttam, ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:513: 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham';
GSP33bbdip13u:518: yadananyādhīnapūrṇānandasukhaṃ sa bhūmā guṇataḥ pūrṇo nārāyaṇa ityuddeśyavidheyayorvyatyayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:519: ata eva svātantryeṇa sukhasya viśeṣaṇāt na muktajīveṣvanaikāntyamityāśayena tadupapādayati - nālpa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:520: 'alpe'; apūrṇe muktajīve tatprasādaṃ vinā yataḥ sukhaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:527: ityuktarītyā viṣṇuparatvādviṣṇoreva bhūmatvaprāpteḥ kathaṃ prāṇaśabdabalādvāyorbhūmatvaprāptirityata āha - utkrānteti //
GSP33bbdip13u:530: ādiśabdena 'utkrāntaprāṇān śūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃ dahet nainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti';
GSP33bbdip13u:546: ekadeśena ca śūlena viluṇṭhya yadi dahetputraḥ śiṣyo vā tathā nainaṃ brūyuḥ janāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:558: sūtre prasīdatyanena jana iti prasādaḥ sukham,
GSP33bbdip13u:562: pūrṇasukhakāryeṇa samyakprasādena duḥkhābhāvaniścayādityāśayena prayuktaṃ samprasādāditi hetumanūdya vyācaṣṭe - samprasādāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:592: parebhyo brahmādibhyo 'dhikatvena mīyata iti parā mā yasyeti vā paramastaṃ paramaṃ 'padaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:608: atra prāṇaśabdena viṣṇorvācyatvāṅgīkāre prāguktatkramaṇādiliṅgavirodha ityato netyāha - tamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:609: prathamādiśabdena taduttaravākyāni dvitīyena talliṅgāntarāṇi ca gṛhyante /
GSP33bbdip13u:614: kintu 'api'; atra prāṇaśabdena viṣṇorvācyatvāṅgīkāre utkramaṇādiliṅgavirodho nāsti /
GSP33bbdip13u:620: iti pūrvavākye prakṛtaḥ paramātmā tacchabdena parāmṛśyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:635: iti sarvagatatvābhidhāyakavākyaśravaṇāt prathamaśrutasvātantryadharmaṃ svaśabdena gṛhītvā sarvagatatvāmādiśabdena grāhyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:636: tathāpi tadvākye bhūmatvaniyatasarvagatatvasya spaṣṭaṃ pratītestadeva vācakaśabdena gṛhītamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:640: kintu 'sa evādhastātsa upariṣṭātsa paścātsa purastātsa dakṣiṇataḥ sa uttarataḥ sa evedaṃ sarvam'; (chāṃ. 7-25-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:641: iti vākye, tathā - 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā'; (chāṃ. 7-24-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:642: iti vākye, tathā - 'sa bhagavaḥ kasmin pratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni'; (chāṃ. 7-24-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:643: ityādi vākye ca sarvagatatvādidharmaśravaṇācca bhūmā viṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip13u:644: teṣāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ viṣṇāvevopapatteriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:645: 'saḥ'; bhūmaśabdito nārāyaṇaḥ adhaḥ upari paścātpurastāddakṣiṇata uttarataḥ sarvatrāsti /
GSP33bbdip13u:647: tenaivedaṃ jagadvyāptaṃ sa eva sarvasattāpradastadarthameva sarvatra tiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:648: 'yatra'; yadvinā yadadhīnaṃ vinā anyannapaśyatyadhikārī sarvameva tadadhīnaṃ paśyati,
GSP33bbdip13u:652: he 'bhagavo'; bhagavān sa bhūmā kasmin pratiṣṭhita iti nāradapraśne mahimaguṇātmake 'sve';
GSP33bbdip13u:664: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ ca darśayati -adṛśyatvādīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:670: nānyadato 'sti śrotṛ nānyadato 'sti mantṛ nānyadato 'sti vijñātṛ etasmin khalvakṣare
GSP33bbdip13u:673: tathā - 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ'; (bṛ. 5-8-9.)
GSP33bbdip13u:676: iti vākyam, tathā - ye tvakṣaramanirdeśyamavyaktaṃ paryupāsate /
GSP33bbdip13u:682: caśabdenākṣaraśabdasya śrītattve prasiddheśceti akṣarapadasūcito hetuḥ samuccīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:691: tathā ca - pūrvamadṛśyatvādhikaraṇe ye adṛśyatvādiguṇā akṣarasya viṣṇoruktāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:692: te vājasaneyake 'tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgi adṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭṛ';
GSP33bbdip13u:708: dvitīyayojanāyāṃ sayuktikaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ pradarśita iti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:717: 'ataḥ'; akṣarādanyat svātantryeṇa draṣṭṛ śrotṛ mantṛ jñātṛ ca nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:739: āsamantāt hantāraṃ saṃhartāraṃ rudraṃ bibharmīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:766: sūtre gahanārthatvātprathamaṃ hetubhāgaṃ vyākariṣyamāṇo 'siddhiparihārāya śrutimudāharati - etasminniti /
GSP33bbdip13u:773: tathāpi 'yadūrdhvaṃ gārgi divo yadarvākpṛthivyā yadantarā dyāvāpṛthivī...... ākāśa eva tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ca'; (bṛ. 5-8-7.)
GSP33bbdip13u:781: ya u tridhātu pṛthivīmuta dyā meko dādhāra bhavanāni viśvā / (ṛ. 1-154-4.)
GSP33bbdip13u:782: sarvādhāratvaṃ kuto viṣṇutvaniścāyakamityataḥ tasya viṣṇuliṅgatvena śrutisiddhatvādityāha - ya iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:789: 'devaḥ'; prāṇākhyo bhagavān svayaṃ jagatā jīvena vā hṛdi bhriyamāṇaḥ tat 'bibharti';
GSP33bbdip13u:791: tarhi jagadīśayoḥ sāmyāpattirityata āha - bhartā sanniti /
GSP33bbdip13u:794: nanvekasyaiva bhagavataḥ bhartā bhriyamāṇo bibhartītyanekavidhavyavahāraviṣayatvaṃ kathamityata āha - eko bahudheti /
GSP33bbdip13u:799: 'yadā bhāraṃ tandrayate sa bhartuṃ parāsya bhāraṃ punarastameti';
GSP33bbdip13u:819: asmin pakṣe asterlaṭi madhyamapuruṣaikavacane chāndasaṃ rūpam /
GSP33bbdip13u:827: ādiśabdena 'yenāvṛtaṃ khaṃ ca divaṃ mahīṃ ca yenādityastapati tejasā bhrājasā ca'; (mahānā. 1-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:828: ityādikam, 'tameva mṛtyumamṛtaṃ tamāhustaṃ bhartāraṃ tamu goptāramāhuḥ'; (tai.ā. 3-14.)
GSP33bbdip13u:830: tathā ca viṣṇuliṅgatvena śrutisiddhāt sarvādhāraṇāt viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:831: pṛthivyādi prakṛtyantaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavacca yat /
GSP33bbdip13u:834: viṣṇuvadanyasyāpi sarvādhāratvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - pṛthivyādīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:852: yuktyantareṇa viṣṇorevākṣaratvaṃ pratipādayatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - sā ceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:853: 'sā ca'; sarvadhṛtirapi ityādinā praśāsanāducyate yato 'to 'pi brahmākṣaramityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:859: iti śrutivākye 'kṣarasya praśāsanādeva asaṅkucitaviṣayānanyāyattaprakṛṣṭājñāmātrādeva sarvadhṛtirucyate seti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:861: nanu sarvadhṛtihetupraśāsanena kuto 'kṣarasya viṣṇutvaniścaya ityatastasya viṣṇukartṛkatvādityāha - tacceti/
GSP33bbdip13u:864: kintu taddhetupraśāsanaṃ ceti samuccaye vā caśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:868: saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇostiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi / (ṛ. 1-164-36.)
GSP33bbdip13u:869: kuta etajjñāyata ityatastaccetyanena pratijñātārthe śrutiṃ pramāṇayati - sapteti //
GSP33bbdip13u:872: nigaraṇena bhriyanta iti garbhāstadāvaraṇabhūtā iti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip13u:886: ete ca viṣṇoḥ pradiśā vidharmaṇi tiṣṭhantītyartha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:887: caturbhissākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiścakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīravīvipat /
GSP33bbdip13u:894: sarvadhṛtihetupraśāsanaṃ viṣṇorivānyasyāpi kiṃ na syādityata āha - eka iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:909: he rājan na kevalaṃ me bhavataśca 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:921: hetvantareṇa viṣṇorevākṣaratvaṃ pratipādayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - anyeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:924: na tadaśnāti kiñcana na tadaśnāti kaścana'; (bṛ. 5-8-8.)
GSP33bbdip13u:932: kintvanyeṣāṃ sakalavastūnāṃ bhāvānāṃ svarūpāṇāṃ sthaulyādidharmāṇāṃ vyāvṛtteḥ ananyāpekṣārāhityasya 'asthūlam';
GSP33bbdip13u:933: ityādinākṣare kathanādapyakṣaraṃ brahmaiveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:965: mīyante ebhiriti mātrā indriyāṇīti ṭīkokteḥ amātraṃ cakṣurādīndriyarahitamiti vyāsatīrthīyoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:970: annādikaṃ śubhamaśubhaṃ vā sāśanānaśanatvena naradevau yathoditau /
GSP33bbdip13u:976: 'asthūlo 'naṇuramadhyamo madhyamo 'vyāpako vyāpako yo 'sau harirādiranādiraviśvo viśvaḥ saguṇo nirguṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1015: naiṣa doṣaḥ - yataste yatra bhagavadapekṣayaiva santi /
GSP33bbdip13u:1022: loke sarvapadārthānāṃ prākṛtaparimāṇasyaiva darśanādityata āha - asthūleti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1029: loke parasparaṃ viruddhāḥ sthūlatvāṇutvādayo dharmāḥ svarūpabhūtā yasya saḥ tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1033: iti brahmāṇḍe ityasya uktatvāt yuktā ityadhyāhāreṇa te dharmāḥ viṣṇoryuktā eveti pūrvavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1040: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛsya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - saditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:1054: anena janmādhikaraṇoktakāraṇatvasya viṣṇvanyasmin pradhāne ākṣepāttenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1060: tatsṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ pralaye sacchabdoktaṃ brahmaivāsīt svātantryeṇeti śeṣaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:1065: 'tadā'; suptau satā sampanno bhavati supta iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1067: atra prakaraṇe śrutānāṃ brahmalakṣaṇānāṃ pradhāne 'sambhavena brahmaṇo 'pi pratipādyatvena pradhānamātrasya pratipādyatvānabhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:1083: sa hi 'avikārassadā śuddho nitya ātmā sadā hariḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1085: vikāritvapratītāvapi kuto 'yaṃ na viṣṇurityata āha - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1089: tattvena niścitastasmāt tadasambhavāt pradhāne ca tatsambhavāt atra ca vikārapratīteḥ tatsat na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1118: anena atra sadevetyādisthāne sacchabdenocyamānaḥ sa viṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip13u:1122: itīkṣaṇākhyakriyākartṛtvaśravaṇādīkṣitṛtvasṛṣṭyādikriyayorvā śravaṇājjaḍaprakṛtau ca tadasambhavāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1123: sūtre sacchabdeneti śeṣaṃ vinā sa ityasyāvṛttiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1131: nanvīkṣaṇakartṛtvaṃ viṣṇuvatpradhānasya kiṃ na syādityataścetanasyāpi iha hetutvenābhimataṃ mukhyekṣaṇaṃ na sambhavati,
GSP33bbdip13u:1144: iti smaraṇāt jñānopādānatayā siddhe pradhāne tatkartṛtvāsambhavena tatra tasyāmukhyatvādityata āha - bahutvaṃ ceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1148: tathā ca bahutvasya sāvakāśatvāt na tadbalenar ikṣatergauṇatvaṃ kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:1155: vikāraṃ vinaiva niyāmakasvarūpabahutvenaiva mukhyapratipādyenaiva yuktamityuktam iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1166: brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantara ākāśaḥ ..... kiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1168: 'ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca
GSP33bbdip13u:1171: atrādhikaraṇe sarvādhāratayānveṣṭavyatayā ca sākṣādvā vyavadhānena vā sāmānyato hṛtpadmasthatvaliṅgasya brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ kriyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1172: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - candreti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1180: chandogaśrutau yadakṣaranayodāhṛtavākyoktaṃ candrādityādhāratvaṃ tadeva tathā tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ ca ākāśasya 'atha';
GSP33bbdip13u:1189: evaṃ sarvādhāratvānveṣṭavyatvasamānādhikaraṇaḥ sākṣādvyavadhānena vā sāmānyato hṛtpadmasthatvarūpo viṣayaśca darśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1191: iti bhāṣyeṇa sa candrādityādyādhāraḥ kiṃ daharākāśaḥ syāt?
GSP33bbdip13u:1193: iti tattvapradīpena ca virodha iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1194: tayorakṣarādhikaraṇākṣepeṇa atra pūrvapakṣa iti darśayituṃ pravṛttatvena viṣayapradarśanāyāpravṛttatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:1195: 'ākāśasya'; ityanena prasiddhabhūtākāśasyaiva sarvādhāratayā sākṣāt hṛtpadmasthatvamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1196: tathā praśnaprativacanapūrvakaṃ sākṣādākāśasyaivātra sarvādhāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvakathanāditi pūrvapakṣayuktiśca pradarśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1197: atra yadyapi 'atha yadidamasmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ tasmin yadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:1198: taṃ cadbrūyuḥ...... kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadvā va vijijñāsitavyamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1208: ityetat brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ nivāsasthānamiti brahmaiva pūrṇatvātpuramiti ca dvedhā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1212: tathā ca etasmin brahmapure śarīre yatpuraṃ brahmāsti 'asmin';
GSP33bbdip13u:1233: na ca brahmapure brahmaṇo veśmetyuktyaivākāśasya brahmatvaniścayātpraśnāyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1240: nanvaṇau tasmin kathaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādyavasthitirityatastasya vyāptatvamāha - yāvāniti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1242: tadākhyo bhagavān guṇataḥ parimāṇataśca yāvān eṣa āntaro 'pi tāvāneva /
GSP33bbdip13u:1243: tathā cāṇāvapi rūper iśaśaktyā mahattvasyāpi sattvādvyāptasya tasyānekādhāratvaṃ yujyata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1244: anyaparityāgenāsyaiva jijñāsyatve ko heturityato 'sya sarvādhāratvākhyaṃ mahimānamāha - ubha ityādinā //
GSP33bbdip13u:1245: asminnantare ye ubhe muktāmukte dyāvāpṛthivyau devyau 'samāhite';
GSP33bbdip13u:1248: tathā ubhau muktāmuktau sūryācandramasau vidyut nakṣatrāṇi ca samāśritānīti chāndogyabhāṣyarītyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1253: tathā ca padme brahmāstītyukte 'pi tadbrahma kiṃ prakāramiti bhāvena punaḥ 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:1256: anena ca yadbrahmānveṣṭavyatayoktaṃ tadbrahmāntarhṛdaye yāvāneṣa prasiddhākāśastāvān sarvo 'pyākāśo vartate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1258: apahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ ca tadityevamākāśādisarvāśriyatvādapahatapāpmatvādiprakāra ukto bhavatīti prakārāntareṇa vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1260: iti padaṃ saptamyantaṃ kṛtvā daharākāśastho vyāptākāśo 'nveṣṭavya iti vā ākāśaḥ iti
GSP33bbdip13u:1262: taṃ viśiṣya jijñāsyatvena tatra dyāvāpṛthivyādikamucyata ityāha /
GSP33bbdip13u:1268: iti nyāyena viṣṇutvena viṣṇoreva hṛtpadmasthvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha - sa ceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1271: tathā ca yassarvādāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvena ca śrutyuktaḥ 'sa cākāśo na viṣṇuḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1273: kuto vā na viṣṇurityata āha - tasyānta iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1274: sa cetyanuṣaktaścaśabdo 'tra buddhyā viviktasuṣirapadenānvīyate 'vadhāraṇe ca ayam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1278: suṣiraśabdaśravaṇāt suṣirasya chidrātmakaprasiddhākāśasyaiva śruteḥ sarvādhāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvokteḥ tatsamākhyānādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1300: ādipadena 'viśoko 'vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1310: viṣṇureva na bhūtākāśādiriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1314: ata eva na tatkāryaṃ jarādikamasyetyucyate - vijara ityādinā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1323: tasya yadiṣṭaṃ tatsvataḥ eva bhavediti satyakāmaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1326: ya evaṃ bhūtaḥ so 'nveṣṭavya iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1350: anyatra pāpādyabhāvasya kathañcidyoge 'pi sarvathā satyakāmatvādikaṃ na yujyata iti jñāpanāyādiśabdabahuvacanayoḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1355: 'svataḥ'; anyānapekṣayā nityaṃ tīrṇā aśanāyādayo yena sa harireka eva, nānyo 'sti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1364: nanu ramādiṣvapahatapāpmatvādīnāmanyānadhīnānāmabhāve 'pi yathā kathañcitsattvādanyagataistaiḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścaya ityata āha - sāpekṣeti
GSP33bbdip13u:1372: tathā ca vivakṣitaliṅgasyānyatrābhāvāttena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1376: sākṣādvābhimānidvārā vā yathākathañcidvṛttāvapi na kathañcidanyatra satyakāmatvādyastīti
GSP33bbdip13u:1381: viṣṇau tadbhāvasya tadanyasmin tadabhāvasya ca pratipādanāya vakroktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1384: tathā cāpahatapāpmatvaṃ svataḥ parādhīnaṃ ceti yathā dvividhaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1389: ataḥ satyakāmatvādivivakṣayā viṣṇoreva hi te guṇā ityuktaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1391: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca / BBs_1,3.15 /
GSP33bbdip13u:1399: brahmalokaṃ brahmaṇo viṣṇorāvāsasthānabhūtaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ taddvārā tatratyaṃ brahma sākṣāllokapadoktaṃ brahmākhyamāśrayaṃ vā 'na vindanti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1405: aharaho hṛdgataṃ brahmalokaṃ prati gatiḥ prāptiḥ 'ucyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:1408: ityatrāpi taditi padaṃ buddhyā vivicya vipariṇāmena sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1409: tathā ca tasmin prāpyamāṇe hṛdgate brahmaloke 'brahmaśabdaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1429: tathā ca suptaprāpyatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvena śrutiprasiddhatvāt tena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1441: na ca gatiśabdayorivāsya sannidhau hṛtpadmasthasyānukterasiddhyanivṛttiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1442: hṛtpadmasthasya brahmaṇa āvāsatvena nimittena tallokabhūte hṛtpadme 'etaṃ brahmalokam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1443: iti prayuktasya brahmalokaśabdasyāṇyāśrayaloke 'pi prayogāttanmukhena tādṛśalokavattvarūpaliṅgasya hṛtpadmasthabrahmaniṣṭhatāyā prāptatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:1448: tathā ca brahmaṇo viṣṇorloke śvetadvīpe araṇyākhyārṇavau sudhāsamudrau arṇavopame sudhāsarasī vā sta iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1449: araśca vaiṇyaśca sudhāsamudrau tatraiva sarvābhimatapradau dvau /
GSP33bbdip13u:1452: viṣṇulokaikaliṅgatvena smṛtisiddhatvādityāśayena sautrahiśabdābhipretāṃ smṛtiṃ darśayati - araśceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1467: yadvā - brahmalokamiti hṛtpadmasya viṣṇulokatvokteḥ tadantargato viṣṇurityuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1470: iti vākye prayogādatra hṛtpadme prayuktam 'etaṃ brahmalokam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1473: iti śrutāvapi brahmalokapadaṃ kuto viṣṇulokaparamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1475: athāpyaraṇyāśrayatvasya bhagavallokaliṅgatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - araśceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1476: asmin pakṣe sautraṃ liṅgapadaṃ hṛtpadmasthasya brahmatvarūpapradānasādhye hetutvābhāvātsūtre liṅgaśabdena pṛthaguktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1477: pūrvavyākhyāne 'pi gatiśabdayorivāsya liṅgasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatāyā upapādanasāpekṣatvena spaṣṭatvābhāvādgatiśabdaliṅgairityanuktvā liṅgaṃ ceti pṛthaguktiryuktā
GSP33bbdip13u:1480: iti vākye hṛtpadmasthaniṣṭhatayā śrutābhyāṃ suptaprāpyabrahmaśabdābhyāṃ ca dahare viṣṇureveti jñāyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1485: viṣṇuliṅgatvena smṛtisiddhamaraṇyāśrayalokavattvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ hṛtpadmasthe viṣṇuloke prayuktabrahmalokapadasya hṛtpadme prayogāt 'dṛṣṭaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1505: tathā ca ya ātmā hṛtpadmasthatvenoktaḥ sa eṣa 'eṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1521: evaṃ setusamuccāyakasautracaśabdasya yathāśrutānvayena liṅgoktiparatayā dhṛteścetyaṃśaṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ samagraṃ sūtraṃ samānoktirūpasamākhyāparatayā vyācaṣṭe - eṣa iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1526: dhṛtiyuktāyāstadbodhikāyā upalabdheḥ vāsaneyake 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete sarvasya vaśī'; (bṛ. 6-4-21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1527: ityādyuktvā āmnātāyāḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidharaṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasambhedāya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1529: samākhyāyāḥ kuto viṣṇuparatvamityata āha - eṣa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1531: ādiśabdena 'eṣa sarvasya vaśī eṣa sarvasyādhipatireṣa sarveśvaraḥ'; (bṛ. 6-4-21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1557: na cāsya hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ kuta iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1571: ityādyaṃśo bhāṣye dhṛteścetyasya liṅgaparatayā yojanāyāṃ nānvitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1580: iti pratīkagrahaṇena 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1581: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivyau';
GSP33bbdip13u:1584: 'sa hi sarvādhipatiḥ sa hi sarvapālaḥ sar iśaḥ sa
GSP33bbdip13u:1587: nanu samākhyāśrutyuktaḥ sarveśvaratvādimahimā kuto viṣṇoravagata ityata āha - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1608: nanu sarveśvaratvādikaṃ viṣṇuvadanyasyāpi kiṃ na syādityata āha - sarveśa iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1612: tathā ca sarveśvaraḥ sarvapālakaśca viṣṇureka eva nānyo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1613: iti skānda ityasya evakāroktapadādhyāhāreṇa tasyahyeṣa mahimeti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1620: samākhyāntararūpayuktyantareṇa viṣṇorhṛtpadmagatākāśasthatvaṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - prasiddheśceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1629: hṛtpadmasthasya viṣṇutvaprasiddheśca tatsamākhyānādapi daharapadmastho viṣṇureveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1633: iti taittirīyavākyāntare prasiddheśceti sūtrasya yadvṛttyantaraṃ ṭīkāyāṃ sūcitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1638: ata eva vigatapāpaṃ dehākhyabrahmapuramadhye saṃsthaṃ hṛdayakamalaṃ prakṛtaṃ tattatreti parāmṛśyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1662: tadantassthatveti pāṭhe paramātmanaḥ suṣirāntassthatvamapekṣya śruteḥ pravṛttatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1685: muktabhāvamādāya jīve sambhavāt asiddhivārāṇāya - svata iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1696: na viṣṇuriti cet - na hṛtpadmastho jīvaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:1698: asya cāsmin jīve svato 'sambhavāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1715: na, tatra hi parameśvaraprasādādāvirbhūtasvarūpo mukta ucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1717: naitadvākyabalena jīvasya satyakāmatvādiguṇān sambhāvya hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1729: atra muktasyokteḥ hṛtpadmasya ca dehāntaravṛttitayā muktatvāyogāt nāyaṃ jīva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1730: nanvasya muktaviṣayatve 'pi muktasyāpi jīvatve nāstyeva jīve 'pahatapāpmatvādisambhavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1732: yato jīvo bhāvibhāvenāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaḥ idānīṃ hṛtpadmagatatayocyata ityata āha - parameśvaraprasādāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:1739: tathā ca yo 'tra mukta ucyate sa tu parameśvaraprasādādeva 'āvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1740: āvirbhūto vyaktaḥ svarūpaḥ apahatapāpmatvādiḥ svadharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1742: ato na daharasthaḥ jīva iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1743: yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati sa bhagavān pūrvoktaḥ// 19 //
GSP33bbdip13u:1751: punaḥ sa ityuktyā sūtre 'nuvṛttasya sa ityasyāvṛttiḥ sūcitā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1752: pūrvokta ityanena sūtre uttaratretyasya pratiyogitayā pūrvatretyupaskāryamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1765: athavā - nanu jīve 'nyādhīnasya tadguṇajātasya sattvātsa evāpahatapāpmatvādinokto hṛtpadmasthaścāstvityata āha - yaditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:1766: yojanā tu - yatprasādātsa jīvo jaḍadehānmukto bhavati,
GSP33bbdip13u:1779: ata evāsyoktaguṇāsambhavābhāvātsa hṛtpadmastho jīva eva neśvara iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:1782: sa ca dehānantargatatayā na hṛtpadmastho bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1783: na ca muktasyāpi jīvatvena tatrāpahatapāpmatvahṛtpadmasthatvayorbhinnakālīnatve 'pi sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatterasti punastasya prāptiriti vācyam
GSP33bbdip13u:1784: yato 'tra vākye yo mukta ucyate sa uttarāduttamātparameśvaraprasādādevāvirbhūtasvarūpo na svataḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1788: iti pūrvavākye yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati sa paramātmā tathā guṇapradātṛtayocyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1791: abhivyaktāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ sa tu bhagavāneva pūrvatra 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā'; (chāṃ. 8-1-5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1793: na muktajīva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1807: svāpekṣitaṃ bhakṣayan hasanvā jñātibhissaha muktaiḥ ajñātibhiḥ pūrvakalpamuktaiḥ 'krīḍan';
GSP33bbdip13u:1814: yaṃ prāpya svena rūpeṇa jīvo 'bhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmeti
GSP33bbdip13u:1818: hṛtpadmasthātmā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya 'itaraparāmarśātsa iti cenna';
GSP33bbdip13u:1819: ityanuvṛttapūrvavākyenāpekṣitasya siddhāntapratijñāyāśca lābhānnetyuktasādhye hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - anyeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1821: iti napuṃsakapadanirdiṣṭasya yamiti pulliṅgena nirdeśo liṅgasyāvivakṣitatvādvā viśeṣyaśabdavivakṣayā vā yuktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1826: jyotiḥ prakāśarūpaṃ paraṃ brahmeti bhinne pade ityapi kecit /
GSP33bbdip13u:1837: yadvā - paramātmana evātmatvavidhānamarthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya sa, tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1842: candrikāyāṃ tu - na kevalaṃ parāmarśasyar iśvarapakṣe bādhakatvābhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1846: iti parāmṛśya tasya hṛtpadmasthatvavidhānātsa hṛtpadmastha ātmā jīva eva neśvara iti cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:1856: etacchabdastu anyārtha iti tredhāsūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1858: anena jīvaḥ paraṃ jyotirākhyaṃ paramātmānamupasampadyāparokṣato jñātvā atha samīpaṃ prāpyavidyāvidhūnanenānandādinā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate āvirbhūtasvaguṇo bhavatīti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip13u:1860: sa eṣa ātmā ya ātmeti prāguktaḥ paramātmeti hovāca brahmādīn prati rameti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1882: kuto netyataḥ pravṛttaṃ taduktamityaṃśaṃ yata ityadhyāhārābhiprāyeṇa hetutayā vyākhyāti - nicāyyatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:1891: brahmaṇi tu aṃśo 'pi pūrṇa iti kathaṃ tasyāṃśato 'lpaukastvamityataḥ sūtraśeṣaṃ prakarāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe - eṣa ma iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1901: kintu sa jīva eveti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:1903: tatra nicāyyatvāditi pūrvatra tasya sarvagatasyāpi viṣṇorvyomavattadalpasthānasthitatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:1907: iti chandogaśrutau tena sarvajyāyastvena vṛddhatamatvena vyāptatvenaiva prakāreṇa tasya viṣṇostaddhṛdayasthatvamuktaṃ smṛtyuktaṃ cāta iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1918: sarvahṛdaye ca ya āste eṣaḥ hṛdayasthāṃśarūpo bhagavān 'jyāyān';
GSP33bbdip13u:1927: vidyā āhiḥ jñaptikāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1942: iti vākyoktaṃ jñānārthaṃ jñeyaprārthanāviṣayatvaṃ vā 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1943: iti brahmajñānānukūlābhivyaktyākhyabhānaprārthanāviṣayatvarūpaṃ vā ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvaṃ liṅgaṃ brahmaṇi samanvīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1944: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati - adṛśyatvāditi/
GSP33bbdip13u:1945: 'uktāḥ'; ānandamayādhikaraṇe udāhṛtādṛśya iti vākye iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1948: dvitīyena 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti na bhāti vā'; (kaṭha. 5-14)
GSP33bbdip13u:1963: ata eva tattvapradīpe teṣāmiti prastutiḥ pūrvapakṣotthāpiketyuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1964: tathācetthaṃ yojanā - pūrvamānandamayādhikaraṇe ye 'dṛśyatvādayo guṇāḥ parameśvarasyoktāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1974: tattu dvitīyādiśabdopāttavākyena caśabdena vā sūcitamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1998: sūtre tasyetyasyānukṛterityanenāpi sambandhe tenaivānukaraṇapratisambandhina ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya tatkartuḥ sūryāditejasaśca lābho bhavatīti spaṣṭatvāttadubhayānuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2002: kintu śrutipratīkarūpamapi sarvajagatprakāśakatvaparaṃ cetyāśayena taddhetvantaraparatayā vyācaṣṭe - tasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2007: tathāpi tāpinī pācinī caiva śoṣiṇī ca prakāśinī /
GSP33bbdip13u:2010: sūtre tadanusāribhāṣye ca caśabdo dvitīyasūtrasya vakṣyamāṇavyākhyānabhedena sarvajagatprakāśakatvarūpoktahetusamuccaye vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:2016: anirdeśyaṃ yatsukhaṃ tadrūpa iti vā vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2019: eka ityādau pulliṅgena prakṛtasyaitaditi napuṃsakaliṅgena grahaṇāya rūpaśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2022: vastutastu - vacanāccetiśabdasya sukharūpaścetyapi sambandhe tenaivānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇākhyaḥ sādhyadharmī sūcita iti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2029: yadyapyatra bhāṣye liṅgadvayasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya vā anirdeśyasukharūpasya vā viṣṇutve sādhye sākṣāddhetutvaṃ bhāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2032: iti vyavadhānena prakṛtaparamātmagrahaṇe liṅgadvayaṃ hetutvena yojitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2033: tathāpi hetudvayena tacchabdena jñānisukhaparityāgena paramātmana eva grahaṇasiddhau
GSP33bbdip13u:2034: tata eva tacchabdagṛhītasya paramātmana evānirdeśyasukharūpatvaṃ paryavasyatītyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:2039: kintvanirdeśyaṃ sukhamityatra samīpoktajñānisukhaparityāge heturucyate ityatra jñāpakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2042: eko vaśī sarvabhūtāntarātmā ekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2045: jñānānandādyabhinnaḥ samābhyadhikaśūnyo vā yaḥ sarvamasya vaśe 'stīti 'sarvavaśī';
GSP33bbdip13u:2051: jñāninaḥ anupaśyantīti prakṛtā ye jñāninasteṣāmeva 'śāśvataṃ sukhaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2060: ityādau prasiddham anirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāmiti manyante ityānukūlyena gṛhṇanti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2063: iti tasya durjñeyatvaṃ ca vadanti jñāninaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2064: tat brahmaṇo rūpaṃ svarūpabhūtaṃ sukhametadekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karotītiprakṛteśvararūpābhinnamiti manyante jñānina iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2066: taduktaṃ nyāyavivaraṇe - 'yadbrahmānirdeśyaṃ sukhamiti vadanti tadetatsvarūpamiti manyanta iti'; /
GSP33bbdip13u:2073: itthamiti sākalyena nirvaktumaśakyaṃ paramaṃ sukhamiti manyante jñānina iti sukharūpatvavidhiparatayā vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2074: bhāṣye 'pyanirdeśyasukharūpa ityetāvanmātragrahaṇena śrutau sukharūpatvaṃ vidheyamiti sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2075: tadanirdeśyaparamasukhātmakaṃ bhagavadrūpaṃ tatparasādamṛte kimu bhāti na bhāti veti samyagbhāti na bhātīti kathaṃ nvahaṃ jānīyāmiti śiṣṭavākyārthastatraivoktaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2082: tathā ca kimu bhātīti praśnasyottarabhūtaṃ na bhātītivākyoktamekamajñeyatvarūpamarthamiti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2088: bhagavatprasādādapi kiṃ sākalyena tajjñānaṃ bhavatīti naciketā yamaṃ pṛcchati - kimu bhātīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2099: itivākye ca sarvasya jagatastatprabhāprakāśyatvasya ca śravaṇena asiddhiparihāre kutastayorviṣṇutvasādhyenāvyabhicaritatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2120: tena 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2134: 'tejaḥ'; ityanena sarvasya jagato nārāyaṇīyaprakāśaprakāśyatvasya coktatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2141: ityānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇaṃ tadetacchabdaparāmṛśyaṃ sukham anirdeśyaṃ sukhaṃ tattu viṣṇurūpameva,
GSP33bbdip13u:2148: tathā tasya sarvasya jagatastasya tatprakāśaprakāśyatvasya 'tasya bhāsā'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2152: ityādiśrutyā smṛtyā ca tasminviṣṇāveva niścayenopapatterjñānisukhe ca 'asambhavāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2154: tathā tasminnupasaṃhāre tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya 'na tatra sūryo bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:2155: iti vākye tasya sūryādyaprakāśyatvasyacokteśceti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2160: yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam // (gī. 15-12.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2170: na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2171: yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama // (gī. 15.6.) iti ca // 23 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2173: kiṃ ca pāṭhake 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamagniḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2178: na jñānisukhamiti sūtrasyārthāntaramapipadasya yuktisamuccayārthatvaṃ cābhipretya tāṃ smṛtimudāharati - na taditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:2195: ityatroktānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya viṣṇutvarūpapradhānasādhye hetūkṛtamanukṛtyādikam 'ahaṃ tattejo raśmīt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2200: iti kāṭhakavākye tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasyoktaṃ sūryādyaprakāśyatvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya viṣṇoḥ sambandhitvenaiva 'na tat';
GSP33bbdip13u:2203: ityatra viṣṇureva pratipādya iti vā sūtrasyārthadvayamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2205: pūrvaṃ brahma na samyagbhātīti tasya durjñeyatvamuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2206: tatkuta ityataḥ idamucyate - yasyaivaṃvidhaṃ sukhaṃ rūpaṃ 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:2224: vyāsatīrthīyaṃ tu vyākhyānāntaraṃ ṭīkākṛdabhipretaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tadvirodhaḥ // 6 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2234: na ca tatra jijñāsyatvāyogavyavaccheda eva kṛtaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2251: na ca vāyoḥ sarvadevopāsyatve 'pi na viṣṇossarvadevopāsyatvahāniriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2253: na ca śrutigataviśvedevaśabdasya gaṇaviśeṣavācitvāt sarvadevopāsya ityuktiranupapanneti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2255: anenar - iśānaśabdasyānyaniṣṭhatvākṣepamukhena phalato mumukṣukartṛkajijñāsyatvasyānyaniṣṭhatvākṣepāt jijñāsādhikaraṇenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2257: sa ca 'evamevaiṣa prāṇa itarān prāṇān pṛthakpṛthageva sannidhatte';
GSP33bbdip13u:2292: saundaryapradhānāḥ striyo vāmāḥ tāḥ netāraṃ viṣṇuṃ 'viśve devāḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2295: pūrvapakṣī tvidaṃ vāyuparaṃ matvā madhyaśabdo 'yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2307: bhinnān svajanyatvenopacāreṇātmapravibhāgān prāṇān vāyūn pṛthaksthāneṣu hṛdayādiṣu sthāpayatīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2309: tatra hi pūrvaṃ vāgādīnāṃ mṛtyugrastatvamuktvā 'athainameva nāpnot';
GSP33bbdip13u:2314: tathā tatraiva caturthādhyāye 'ayaṃ vāva śiśuḥ yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ'; (bṛ. 4-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2315: iti candrikodāhṛte vākye sthūladehākhyavistṛtapradeśagataliṅgaśarīrarūpagṛhe viṣṇurūpāyāṃ sthūṇāyām annākhyena śrīrūpeṇa dāmnā baddho govatsarūpovāyurmadhyamatvenocyate
GSP33bbdip13u:2316: kuvidaṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan /
GSP33bbdip13u:2335: evakāro vāyuliṅgasadbhāvāt vāyureveśānaḥ kiṃ na syāditi codyaparihārāya liṅgebhyaḥ śruteḥ prābalyamāha /
GSP33bbdip13u:2345: kutaḥ? yastatra pramito viṣṇāveva mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ prasiddho 'madhye vāmanam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2352: kutaḥ? yastatra viṣṇāveva pramito mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ prasiddho 'nyatra niravakāśo 'madhye vāmanamāsīnam'; (kaṭha. 5-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2355: sūtre evakāraprayogena sūcitaṃ śruteḥ prābalyaṃ liṅgasya prābalyaniṣedhamukhena darśayati - na hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2358: tathā ca 'hi'; yasmāt na śruterliṅgaṃ balavat,
GSP33bbdip13u:2361: śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2362: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ balīyaḥ syādevamāgamanirṇayaḥ / iti skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:2363: kuto na śruterliṅgaṃ balavadityatastathāsati śruterliṅgātprābalyavacanavirodhāpatterityāśayena tadvākyaṃ paṭhati - śrutiriti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2375: atra 'vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ samākhyā ca tathāvidhā';
GSP33bbdip13u:2379: uktaṃ hi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ - samākhyāditvena grahaṇaṃ 'śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca';
GSP33bbdip13u:2385: 'balīyaḥ'; atiśayena svabhāvato balavat yathātraivādhikaraṇe anantaroddiṣṭaliṅgāpekṣayā pūrvoddiṣṭā vāmanaśrutiḥ svataḥ prabalā/
GSP33bbdip13u:2387: yathā - daharādhikaraṇe daharākāśasya sākṣātsarvādhāratvaprāpakāt 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate ..... ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī'; (chāṃ. 8-1-2,3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2394: yathā - samagropaniṣadar iśvaraparatvasādhakāt ṣaṭpraśnarūpasthānāt prabalam 'ātmata eṣa prāṇo jāyate'; (praśna. 3-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2396: ata evātrādhikaraṇe ṣaṭpraśnoktaprāṇavyavasthāpakatvādīnāṃ mukhyaprāṇaliṅgatvamupetya śrutyā bādha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2399: iti nārāyaṇānuvākasamākhyāyāḥ prabalaṃ teṣāṃ viṣṇutvasādhakaṃ brahmaparānekaprakaraṇasandarbharūpaṃ sthānam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2401: ādyayā samākhyayā nirṇetavyaṃ yathā - puruṣasūktasamākhyayā vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2404: viruddhaiteṣāṃ samavāye sati prabalena pūrveṇottarabādhe ca sati 'āgamanirṇayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2410: tathāpi bāhulyena pūrvapakṣyuktaliṅgānāmapi prābalyātsāmyenānirṇaya evetyata āha - tacceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2416: tathā ca bāhulye 'pi liṅgānāṃ sāvakāśatvāttebhyaḥ śruterekasyā api niravakāśāyāḥ prābalyānnānirṇaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2424: ityatrāntaryāmiparatvaṃ bruvatā sūtrakāreṇetaravyāvṛttyā tasyaiva prāṇatvokteḥ sādhitatvādityapi vyākhyeyametat /
GSP33bbdip13u:2425: tathā ca śrutyantare prāṇaniṣṭhatayā liṅgasyoktāvapi na tadvirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2439: tatroktaliṅgānāmapi tatparatvamupetya teṣāṃ śrutyā bādhasyoktatvāt kathaṃ śrutyantarasthaprāṇavāyuśabdayoḥ viṣṇuparatvāṅgīkāreṇa samādhānam
GSP33bbdip13u:2444: iti vākyaṃ sthānātprakaraṇasya prābalye udāhṛtamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2451: na ca vyomavatsarvagatasyāpyaṇutvaṃ yujyata iti pratipāditamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2464: tasmādavadhāraṇārthakamātraśabda evāyamaṅgīkāryaḥ uktaṃ hi candrikāyām - mātraśabdasyāvadhāraṇārthakatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:2469: tathā ca sarvagate harāvaṅguṣṭhamātratvoktiranupapanneti nātreśāno viṣṇurityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya tadakṣarāṇi vyācaṣṭe - hṛdīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2475: hṛdi vidyamāno yo 'yamavakāśo 'ṅguṣṭhaparimitadeśastadapekṣayā tatrābhivyaktatāvatparibhitabhagavanmūrtiviśeṣamapekṣya tasya viṣṇoraṅguṣṭhamātratvam astyata iti/
GSP33bbdip13u:2477: hṛdi vidyamānāvakāśamapekṣya tatsambandhāttasyāṅguṣṭhamātratvavacanaṃ yujyata ityāvṛttiṃ vinā yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2478: prathamapakṣe śaktyāparimite 'pi bhagavati mūrtiviśeṣe vyaktyātmanāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya sthānini brahmaṇi tatsambandhādupacāreṇoktiriti bhedaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:2479: atra ṭīkāyāṃ hṛdyavakāśāpekṣayeti bhāṣyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sautratuśabdo 'vadhāraṇatayā vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2482: tattatsthāneṣu vyaktamūrtiviśeṣāpekṣayā vā upacāreṇa vā tattatparimāṇatvoktyā 'yastvetameva prādeśamātram'; (chāṃ. 5-18-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2490: iti kvacidaṅguṣṭhāgrapramāṇakatvoktervirodha iti codyaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2498: mūleśa iti nāmāsmin sarve jīvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
GSP33bbdip13u:2500: prāviśanti suṣuptau tu prabudhyante tatastathā // iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2501: asmin mūleśavyāpinormadhye 'ṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ ca dehe dehāṅguṣṭhamitatvaṃ jīvahṛdi jīvāṅguṣṭhamitatvamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2506: yadi caivaṃ tadā jīvo 'pi jāgradavasthāyāṃ dakṣiṇākṣisthaḥ svapne kaṇṭhadeśasthaḥ suptau hṛdayastho bhavati,
GSP33bbdip13u:2510: kathaṃ ca hṛtkarṇikāmūlagatabhagavadrūpe sadā pratiṣṭhito jīvaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2511: suptau hṛtkarṇikāgragate harau praviśatītyuktiriti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:2512: yatassarvadā hṛdi sthitameva jīvasvarūpaṃ jāgaritādāvakṣyādiṣvapi viśeṣasannihitaṃ dīpaprakāśavadityaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2513: yathoktamaitareyabhāṣye - hṛde sthitameva tasya rūpaṃ jāgarite 'pyakṣyādiṣu viśeṣasannihitaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2515: anekadhā sthitānāṃ bhagavanmūrtīnāṃ śaktyā sarvagānāmapi tatra tatra vyaktyātmanā
GSP33bbdip13u:2516: anekālpaparimāṇavattvaṃ ca yujyata iti na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2520: tathā hi kiṃ tattadaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā yatkiñcidaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2525: manuṣyādhikāratvāt itisūtraśeṣaṃ tuśabdasya kākākṣinyāyena atrāpyanvayaṃ tasyāpyarthatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2539: sūtre bhāṣye ca manuṣyāṇāmadhikāro yasmin athavā - adhikriyate 'tretyadhikāra upāsanaṃ śāstraṃ vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:2549: ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ manuṣyāṇāmeva vedavidyopāsanādhikāritveneti manuṣyatvaṃ vyāpakatvenoktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2550: na cānadhikāriṇāṃ paśvādīnāṃ dehasthitasya bhagavato 'ṅguṣṭhaparimitatvābhāve parimāṇāntarānukteradravyatvāpattiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2567: tacca mūrtiviśeṣe tanmātratvasya sattvādupacāreṇa vā yujyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2569: yatkiñcidaṅguṣṭhamātratvoktervyarthatvenāsambhavena ca tattadaṅguṣṭhamātratve vācye tasya ca paśvādīnāmaṅguṣṭhābhāvena tadantargataviṣṇāvayogāditi vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2593: iti śruteśca koṭidvayopasthāpakatvena sandehabījatvāttaduktyaiva devānāmadhikāro 'sti uta nāstīti saṃśayo,
GSP33bbdip13u:2597: tataḥ kimityatassaṃśayabījaṃ vighaṭayan siddhāntayituṃ sūtramavatārayati - tiryagādīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2615: atra taduparīti sādhyadharmisūcakaṃ padamanūdya teṣāṃ tasmāttasyā iti vigrahāśrayeṇa vyācaṣṭe - taduparīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2620: manuṣyāṇāṃ satāṃ devatāpadayogyānāṃ jīvānāṃ padaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyaśarīraṃ prāptānāṃ satāṃ 'tasmāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2629: adhikārasambhavo 'pi kuta ityato 'trāpi sambhavādityetadevāvṛttya hetutayā yojayati - viśiṣṭeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2635: na cārthitvābhāvaḥ ityatrāpi teṣāṃ sambhavati hītyeva hetuḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2642: tattvapradīparītyā tātparyajñāpanārthamadhikārādhikyajñaptidārḍhyārthaṃ ca bādarāyaṇaḥ svayameva vaktītyāha iti vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2644: tathā ca yato na kevalaṃ devādipadayogyajīvānāṃ padaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ bhūmau kiñcitkālaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ satāṃ tasyāṃ daśāyāmeva adhikāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2646: tasmānmanuṣyatvādupari tadatyayena tābhyāṃ vidyākarmabhyāṃ tasyāḥ devāditvaprāpteruparitanakāle 'pi devabhāvamāpannānāmapi vedavidyāyāmadhikāro 'styeva /
GSP33bbdip13u:2649: na ca devādīnāṃ viśiṣṭabuddhisāmarthyasadbhāve 'pyarthitvābhāvādadhikārābhāva iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2651: vidyāsādhyajñānamokṣayorarthitvasambhavāditi bhagavān bādarāyaṇo manyata iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2655: tathā sati sūtre 'manuṣyamātravyāvartakamanuṣyapadaprayogena tiryagādivadamanuṣyatvānna devā vedavidyādhikāriṇa ityanumānasūcanāttadvirodhāpatterityata āha - tiryagādīnāmiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2660: anenādhikārābhāve viśiṣṭabuddhyādirāhityasya prayojakatvoktyā paroktāmanuṣyatvahetoḥ sopādhikatvaṃ sādhyavyatirekasādhakopādhivyatirekākhyapratipakṣagrastatvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2661: sautramanuṣyapadaṃ ca mananādiśīlaparaṃ sat viśiṣṭabuddhyādirahitameva cetanaṃ vyāvartayati,
GSP33bbdip13u:2662: na tu martyabhinnamātramiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2665: ata eva na tadabhāvo 'pi sādhyavyatirekaheturityata āha - teṣāmapīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2671: tiraścāmapyadhikāre 'pi na virodhaḥ nanu kathamavirodhastiryakṣu sarvatra vedādhikāre mānavirodhāpātādityata āha - teṣāmapīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2682: ata eva sautramanuṣyapadasya vyāvarttyasaṅkoco 'pi yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2686: teṣāmadhikāraniṣedhasya taddarśanasya vā virodhitvādityāśaṅkya nādya ityāha - niṣedheti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2690: na kevalaṃ yena śūdrādau vyabhicāraḥ syāditi sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2697: ityādinā jaritārisārisṛkkastambamitradroṇākhyeṣu pakṣiṣu madhye jaritāriragrajaḥ svabhrātṛbhirasmānmocayeti prārthitaḥ 'ayamagne jaritā'; (ṛ.10-142-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2704: dṛśyante hītyanena - devā vedavidyādhikāriṇaḥ niṣedharāhitye sati viśiṣṭabuddhyādimattvāt tādṛśamartyavaditi siddhāntyabhimatānumāne manuṣyatvopādhirnirasto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2710: tatra yadi manuṣyāḥ santo devādayo bhavanti tatpūrvaṃ devatābhāvāddevatoddiṣṭakarmaṇi virodha iti cet -
GSP33bbdip13u:2711: devānāṃ vedavidyādhikārasiddhyarthaṃ taduparītyanenoktaṃ sāditvamākṣipya samādadhatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā'kṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - virodha iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2713: devādipadayogyā jīvāḥ pūrvaṃ bhūmau kiñcitkālaṃ manuṣyāḥ santa eva atha devādayo bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2717: kuta ityatastatpakṣe bādhakoktiparaṃ virodha ityaṃśaṃ sahetukaṃ vyācaṣṭe - tatrayadīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2722: yadvā - manuṣyā eva devādayo bhavantītyuktyā prāptābhedaśaṅkāṃ vārayituṃ manuṣyā evetyādisvapadāni varṇayati - tatreti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2728: tathā ca yadi pūrvaṃ manuṣyāḥ santo 'pyatha devādayo bhavantītyuktamityucyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:2730: tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ teṣāṃ devādipadaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ sādhakatvāvasthāyāṃ 'devatābhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2731: devatāyā asattvāt yena karmaṇā devāditvaṃ sādhyamityuktam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2741: yojanā tu - na karmaṇi virodha, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2744: na ca tatra pramāṇābhāva ityataḥ prāptamaneketyaṃśaṃ pratipattiśabdasya jñānārthatvabhramaṃ vārayan tatsambandhipradarśanapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe - anekeṣāmiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2749: tathā sati yena karmaṇā devāditvaṃ sādhyamityuktam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2750: tatra karmaṇi śabde ca virodhastasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt tatpūrvaṃ devatābhāvāditi cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:2779: ṛjavo brahmamukhyā hi suparṇaśśeṣa eva ca /
GSP33bbdip13u:2782: na ca vasurudrādityamarutsādhyeṣu vasūnāmāditvāt ṭīkāyāṃ vasvādidevā iti vaktavyam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2784: ata eva tattvapradīpe 'pūrve sādhyāḥ vasvādayo devāḥ pūrvasiddhā muktā vā';
GSP33bbdip13u:2789: ye padaṃ prāpya jagaddhārakā abhūvan te devā yajñena yajñamayajanta te ha nākaṃ mokṣagatātiśayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2790: sacante iti śruterarthāntaravivakṣayā tadupapattestadanusāreṇa taṭṭīkāyāṃ vyākaraṇasyāpyupapatteśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:2797: tadākṣipya samādadhatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā'kṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - śabda iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2800: tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - yadyanekeṣāṃ pūrvapūrvamuktyā devatāpadaprāpterdarśanānna karmaṇi virodha iti ucyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:2801: tarhi tatraiva śabde darśanapadokte vede 'prāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:2804: nanu devānāmanityatve 'pi vedānāmaprāmāṇyaṃ kuta ityataḥ - taduditānāmityāha /
GSP33bbdip13u:2807: nanu devānāmanityatve 'pi na tadvācakavedasya vācyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:2808: devavadvācakavedasyāpyanityatvena kadāpi vācyahīnatvābhāvādityata uktaṃ - vedasya nityatvāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:2809: vedasya nityatvameva kuta ityata uktaṃ - vāceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2820: nanu vedasyānityatve 'pyāptimūlatvena prāmāṇyaṃ sambhavatītyata āha - āptyaniścayāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:2822: tathā ca kartuḥ sārvajñādau mānābhāvena vedakartuḥ sārvajñādirūpāptyaniścayādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2824: tathāpi na vede tanmūlatvaniścaya ityāha - āptyaniścayāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:2831: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - prāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ vedasyāptapraṇītatve mūlapramāṇena bhāvyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2840: tathā tasya nityatve 'pyāptoktatvarūpaguṇajanyatvābhāvena prāmāṇyābhāvāpattiriti samaṃ bādhakamityata āha - svata iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2849: tathā ca vedasya nityatvasya siddhatvāttadvācyadevānāmanityatve vācyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyāpattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2851: nanvatītakalpe ekadevatābhāve devatāntarasadbhāvādyathā karmaṇyuddeśyābhāvanimitto virodho nāsti,
GSP33bbdip13u:2852: tathātrāpyekadevatānāśe 'pi punaranyadevatotpattisambhavānna vācyahīnatvākhyo virodha ityata āha - punaranyabhāvaniyamābhāvācceti/
GSP33bbdip13u:2858: anenottarakāle devatābhāvavirodhaḥ karmaṇyapi samāna iti sautraśabdaśabdena karmāpyupalakṣaṇīyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2860: 'tadupari'; itisūtrādaperanukarṣokteḥ tasya ca na kevalaṃ śabde uttarakāle devatābhāvavirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2874: tatra yadyapi virūpeti svātmānaṃ prati sambodhanamityukteḥ viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ virūpākhyaṛṇessambodhanamityukteśca virodho bhāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2876: uktaṃ hi tattvapradīpe - prerayeti prārthanaṃ virūpasya ṛṣerantaryāmiviṣayamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2877: virūpakartṛkaṃ taduddeśyakaṃ sambodhanamiti pakṣe 'pi svātmaśabditasvajīvaṃ pratisambodhanamiti ṭīkārthābhyupagamānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2879: na ca padmanābhatīrthakṛtaviṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ nyāyaratnāvalyāṃ dharmeṇa virūparṣiṃ pratyetaducyata ityuktatvāttadvirodha iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2880: prathamaṃ yamadṛṣṭasya mantrasyānantaraṃ virūpeṇāpi dṛṣṭatvasambhavena tadā svasambodhanasambhavenāvirodhāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:2881: tathā ca he virūpa abhito dyauḥ prakāśo yasyāsāvabhidyuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2884: tattvapradīparītyā vṛṣā śreṣṭhastasya caturthī vṛṣṇe iti vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2893: ityādeḥ, ata eva śabdātteṣāṃ prabhavaniyamāt mahatāṃ pratyakṣāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:2897: kuta ityataḥ prāptaṃ prabhavāditi hetuṃ tatsambandhipradarśanapūrvakaṃ pravāhataḥprabhavaniyamaparatayā ca vyācaṣṭe - teṣāṃ prabhavaniyamāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:2901: tathā ca devānāṃ svarūpeṇa nityatvābhāve 'pi pravāharūpeṇa nityatvānna tadvācakavedāprāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2902: nanu pramāṇābhāvādasiddho heturityataḥ prāptamataḥśabdamanūdya sāvadhāraṇatvena vyācaṣṭe - ata eva śabdāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:2911: ato na devaprabhavaniyamaṃ pramāpayatītyato 'pyāha - ata eveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2912: tathā ca dhātā yathā pūrvakalpe sūryācandramasāvakalpayat tathāsminkalpe 'pīti pratikalpaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2913: śrutyā kathane devānāṃ sarvakalpeṣu prajananākhyasadbhāvasiddheradhyāhāraṃ vinā ataevaśabdāt
GSP33bbdip13u:2914: buddhisthāt yathaiveti spaṣṭaśrutyantarācca teṣāṃ sarvakalpeṣu prabhavasiddhernoktacodyāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2915: nanu śrutāvupacāreṇāpyuktiḥ sambhavatīti na tayā devaprabhavaniyamaniścaya ityataḥ prāptaṃ pratyakṣetyaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - mahatāmiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2920: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu //
GSP33bbdip13u:2927: nanvayogināṃ śrutipratyakṣayoraviśvāsena teṣāṃ devaprabhavaniścayābhāva ityataḥ prāptamanumānetyaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - yatheti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2928: idānīntanakāle yathā devāssanti tathoparibhāvikāle 'pi devā bhaviṣyantītītareṣāṃ mahadbhyo 'nyevāmayogināmanumānādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2937: ityādiśrutau nityatayā siddhe vede karmaṇi cottarakalpe vācyoddeśyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ syāditi cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2949: tathā mahadbhyaḥ itareṣāmayogināmanumānācca tatsiddheriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2950: 'yathaiva'; iti śrutyarthastu - yathā pūrvayugātyaye kalpātyaye vā punaryugakalpāntarotpattiriti kāle prabhavaniyamaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2967: ata eva śabdasya nityatvādeva ca devapravāhanityatvaṃ yuktam // 29//
GSP33bbdip13u:2968: yuktyantareṇa devapravāhasya nityatāṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - ataeveti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2982: atrāpi bhāṣye caśabdena ca tadvācyadevatāsvarūpasyaiva nityatvena anyathopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2987: ataeva svarūpanityatvāyogena pravāharūpeṇaiva teṣāṃ nityatvāvaśyaṃbhāvādityādiṭīkoktārthaḥ sarvo 'pi saṅgṛhītaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2994: tathā hi - kiṃ pūrvakalpe muktā eva devā uttarakalpe punarāvartante, tadanye vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3001: vācyadevānāṃ ca nānāvidhanāmarūpavattvādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - samāneti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3017: ma tadvācake ekavidhe 'pi śabde vede 'prāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3019: samāne ekavidhe nāmarūpe yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3021: candrikāyāṃ tu - sūtre bhāṣye ca tattvapradīpānusārādāvṛttāviti vicchedaṃ bhāṣye muktyāvṛttāvityasyaikapadyaṃ cāśritya ekasya padaprāptāvanyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:3022: punastasya muktau punaranyasya padaprāptiriti krameṇa mukterāvṛttāvapīti vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:3026: nanu sarvadevānāṃ samānanāmarūpatve pramāṇābhāvādasiddho heturityataḥ prāptaṃ darśanādityaṃśaṃ vyākhyāti -yatheti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3034: kiṃ ca devapravāhasya nityatve teṣāṃ samānanāmarūpatve vā na tadvācitvena nityavedaprāmāṇyopaptiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3037: ataḥ paramenaṃ vakṣyāmīti vimṛśya vṛttiḥ sambhavatītyataḥ prāptaḥ smṛterityaṃśa ityāśayena tāṃ darśayati - anādīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3058: tāneva śabdān teṣu saṅketitavān pratikalpamayaṃ śabdo 'tra śakta iti jñāpitavān /
GSP33bbdip13u:3059: 'yāśca'; ṛṣīṇāṃ devānāṃ vedeṣūktāḥ dṛśyante iti dṛṣṭayo rūpāṇi,
GSP33bbdip13u:3060: tāśca tāni ca tathaiva pūrvakalpīyarūpasādṛśyenaiva nirmame iti smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3065: anena - prācīnānāṃ devānāṃ muktyā punaḥ svapadeṣvavṛttāvapi tadanyeṣāṃ tatra vṛttāvapi na tadvācake ekavidhe 'pi śabde 'prāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:3072: atra tattvapradīpe pralaye kasyāpi devasyābhāvena tadā vedasya vācyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyamāśaṅkya bhagavanmātraviṣayatvena tadupapattiriti samādhānamabhipretya
GSP33bbdip13u:3082: yathā yena prakāreṇedānīṃ devā bhavanti tathānyadāpītyanumānācca tadavagamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3087: samānāni sadṛśāni nāmāni yeṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ tāni tathoktāni,
GSP33bbdip13u:3088: tādṛśāni rūpāṇi yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvastasmāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3094: yathā pūrvaṃ pūrṇajñānaḥ sarvasvatantraḥ sarvanāmarūpasthitastathaiva sa dhātā sūryādīnakalpayaditi śruteḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3095: ataḥ sūryādikḷpteḥ prāgapi pralaye śabdaprāmāṇyāvirodha iti siddhamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3106: tathā hi dvividhā vedavidyāḥ - muktiphalārthāstaditaraphalārthā iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3112: tatsādhyānāṃ mokṣetaraphalānāṃ madhye keṣāñcidyogyānāṃ prāptatvena ayogyānāṃ ca prāptumaśakyatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:3125: yadvā - prāptapadānāmityatratyaṃ padānāmityetadbuddhyā vivicyātra dharmitvena sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3139: tathā cetthaṃ bhāṣyayojanā - madhvādividyāsu 'asau vā ādityo devamadhu';
GSP33bbdip13u:3140: iti prastutyāmnātena 'sa etadevāmṛtaṃ veda vasūnāmevaiko bhūtvā agninaiva mukhenaitadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati';
GSP33bbdip13u:3149: prāptumayogyaphalatvāt tatrāpyarthitvāsambhavātteṣāṃ madhvādividyāsu 'anadhikāram anadhikārābhāvaṃ jaiminirmanyata'; iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3150: jaiminigrahaṇena āptatamena jaimininaivaṃ matatvācca na teṣāmadhikāra iti yuktyantaraṃ sūcyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3155: taistadvidyāsūktaphalānāṃ madhye keṣāñcidyogyānāṃ prāptatvena keṣāñcitprāptumayogyatvena teṣāṃ tatrārthitvāsambhavāditi āptatamo jaiminirmanyata iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3157: ityanena ādityasya viṣṇoḥ paramānandatvena madhutvamuktvā 'sa etat';
GSP33bbdip13u:3174: evaṃ 'yo'; devatvayogyo adhikārī vākprāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanohṛdayanāmakaṃ brahmopāste sa devatvamapyeti tato 'devo bhūtvā';
GSP33bbdip13u:3175: svottamadeveṣu sāyujyaṃ prāpya devān śvetadvīpagatabhagavadrūpaviśeṣān caturmukhabrahmaṇā sahāpyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3189: tatrārthitvasambhavāt ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - jyotiṣīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3194: yatkiñcidviṣayake jñāne viṣayatayā sarvabhāvasyāsiddhatvāt tajjñāpanāya sarvajñatva iti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3195: tena sūtre vastūnāmityantarbhāvasambandhijñāpakaṃ padamadhyāhāryamiti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3197: asya hetorasambhavādityanuvṛttahetudvārā madhvādiṣu anadhikāraṃ manyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3200: saptamī ca caitrarathasya buddhau śāstrārtha itivat yujyate iti sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3201: kathaṃ vastūnāṃ jñāne antarbhāva ityataḥ sarvajñatve bhāvāditi svapade varṇayati - āditya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3202: sarvavastūnāmādityaprakāśe antarbhāvavat tadgṛhītatvavat tajjñāne taduparīti prastutadevatākartṛkajñāne sarvavastūnām 'antarbhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:3215: tathā ca na devānāmubhayavidyāsādhyajñāne 'rthitā sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3217: na cāsya hetoḥ pūrvasūtroktāsambhavahetūpapādakatvāt kathamatra caśabda iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3218: pūrvaṃ phalamukhena atra ca sādhanamukhena arthitvāsambhavasya abhipretatvena asya hetordvitīyāsambhavopapādakatve 'pi asambhavasāmānye upapādakatvena caśabdopapatteḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3221: uta mokṣaphalārthāyāṃ vidyāyāmadhikāra iti pakṣadvaye 'pi sādhānamukhena doṣoktiparatayā pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3227: tathāpi mokṣetaraphalakavidyāsvanadhikāra iti prācīnapakṣe na kevalaṃ madhuvidyāphale vasutvādau prāptatvāt devānāmarthitvābhāvāt tadvidyāyāmadhikārābhāvo doṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3228: kintu vasutvādiphalasādhanajñāne 'pyarthitvābhāvāt adhikārābhāva ityasambhavadoṣe upapādakāntaramuktaṃ bhavatīti ṭīkāyāmuktatvānna visaṃvādaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:3231: hetvantareṇa etatsādhayatīti sattarkadīpāvalī ca ādyapakṣavivakṣayā pravṛttā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3233: anena - na kevalaṃ mokṣetaraphalārthaṃ madhvādiṣvanadhikāraṃ manyate jaiminiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3234: kintu ādiśabdena vā āvṛttajyotiśśabdena vā gṛhītāyāṃ 'satyaṃ jñānam';
GSP33bbdip13u:3242: na kevalaṃ vasvādidevānāṃ phale 'rthitvābhāvāt madhvādiṣvanadhikāraṃ jaiminirmanyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:3247: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayatayā antarbhāvātphalasādhanajñānasya siddhatvāditi yāvaditi vā sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3253: evaṃ devairmokṣetarayogyaphalānāṃ prāptatvāt ayogyānāṃ prāptumaśakyatvāt mokṣasyāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:3254: brahmajñānitvena arthato labdhatvādarthitvābhāvena teṣāṃ kāsvapi vidyāsu adhikārābhāve
GSP33bbdip13u:3255: jaiminimatāvalambinā samarthite punaradhikāraṃ samarthayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhāvamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3269: astītyasya kartṛsāpekṣatvāt taṃ darśayati - prakāśaviśeṣa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3272: tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - bādarāyaṇastu bhagavān devānāṃ madhvādyaśeṣavidyāsu adhikārabhāvaṃ manyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3276: jñānamātreṇa asādhyasya mokṣaphale atiśayasya bhāvāt siddherarthitvasambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3277: na ca phale 'tiśayasya siddhatvena tatrārthitvasambhave 'pi tatsādhanavidyānāṃ nityasiddhatvāt vidyāvicārasya jñānārthatvāt tatrārthitvāsambhava iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3286: sarvaṃ vidhīyate nityaṃ sarvayajñādikarma ca / iti skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:3288: devānāṃ bhavatītyetat kuto jñāyate ityāśaṅkāṃ parihartumuktārthe hiśabdasūcitāṃ smṛtiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:3311: ata eva vidyāvicāreṇa sādhyasya prakāśasya jñānaviśeṣasya sambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:3323: ekaśabdo avadhāraṇārtho viriñcasyāpi varjyatvanivārakaḥ skānde uktamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3324: ataḥ phalaviśeṣabhāvādasti hi prakāśaviśeṣa ityanayornāsiddhiriti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3328: uktaṃ ca tat phalaṃ ca uktaṃ phalaṃ yasyeti ca vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3329: tathā ca tattadvidyoktaphalārthaṃ tatphalakaprāgāptajñānārthaṃ ca yo 'yamadhikārastadabhāvamātraṃ 'jaiminimatam';
GSP33bbdip13u:3332: kimato yadyevamityata āha - ata iti jaiminyuktasya sūtrakāreṇāpyaṅgīkṛtatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:3333: sūtrakṛduktasya ca jaimininā anirastatvānna tayorvirodhaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3338: nanu kimanayormatayorviṣayavailakṣaṇyakalpanena virodha eva kiṃ na syādityata āha - sarvajñasyeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3344: vicintitārthaikadeśaṃ tanmataikadeśameva svīkṛtya tadeva brūyuḥ, nānyat /
GSP33bbdip13u:3346: teṣāṃ kṛṣṇamunīnāṃ mataṃ parasparaṃ na viruddhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3348: ato viṣayavailakṣaṇyameva kalpyaṃna matavirodha iti bhāvaḥ // 8 //
GSP33bbdip13u:3372: nanu pautrāyaṇākhyapuruṣasya śūdratvameva kuta ityataḥ tajjñāpakamāha - aha hāretvā śūdreti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3375: nanvadhikārābhāve 'pi pautrāyaṇo vedavidyāṃ vicārayāmāseti kiṃ na syādityatopyāha - pautrāyaṇokteriti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3376: pautrāyaṇaṃ prati raikkeṇa nispṛheṇa muninā saṃvargavidyopadeśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3384: chāndogye caturthādhyāye saṃvargaprakaraṇe hītthamākhyāyikā - pautrāyaṇo nāma rājā prāsādāgre niśāyāṃ śayāno 'bhūt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3386: uparipatatāṃ parasparaṃ vārtāṃ kurvatāṃ teṣāṃ madhye dvāvagragāmināvāstām /
GSP33bbdip13u:3390: evamuktaḥ paro haṃsaḥ kamityākṣepavacanena rājānamanādṛtya raikvamunimeva praśaśaṃsa /
GSP33bbdip13u:3391: tacchrutvā paritaptamanā rājā talpādutthitastvarayā svasārathimāhūya raikvagaveṣaṇāyādideśa /
GSP33bbdip13u:3392: sa tatra tatra raikvamanviṣyan nāvidamiti prathamamāgataḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3393: punastallakṣaṇoktipūrvakaṃ rājñā tanmārgaṇāyādiṣṭaḥ punaranviyaṣya kvacitpradeśe raikvamavalokya punā rājānaṃ pratyetyāha - raikvamavidamiti yathāvṛttamavadat /
GSP33bbdip13u:3394: tadā rājā svasārathivacanena raikvamunisthānaṃ niścitya tasmāttattvaṃ vividiṣurgurudakṣiṇāṃ gṛhītvā tatsamīpaṃ jagāma /
GSP33bbdip13u:3395: atha dvāri śakaṭasyādhasthāt sthitaṃ raikvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambodhya dakṣiṇāṃ nivedya mahyaṃ vidyāṃ brūhītyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:3396: tadā taṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ paro lokavilakṣaṇo raikvaḥ pratyācakhyau /
GSP33bbdip13u:3399: hāra itveti bhinnapadatve visargalope guṇe hāretveti bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3400: tathā ca he śūdra hāraḥ kaṇṭhamālākhyaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ itvā rathaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3402: gobhissaha tavāstvityarthaḥ hāretvānāvityekapadatvapakṣe dvivacanasya ekavacanādeśo vā ākārādeśo vā kartavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3412: pūrvapakṣyuktaliṅgadarśanasya anyathopapattipradarśanāya pravṛttasya tadādravaṇādityasya anvayayogyārthākāṃkṣotthāpakaṃ sūtrasya phalitārthaṃ darśayati - neti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3416: tarhi kathamasya śūdreti sambodhitatvaṃ yujyate rūḍhyabhāvādityato yogādevetyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:3417: tacchabdapravṛttinimittapradarśakaṃ tadādravaṇāditi sūtrāṃśaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ matvā vyācaṣṭe - śuceti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3421: anena tadādravaṇādityasya sūtre śūdratvamityadhyāhṛtena śūdreti sambodhitatvarūpārthabodhakena padenānvayaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3422: tathā ca na sambodhanānupapattiriti nedaṃ śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāre liṅgamityato na śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti nañāvṛttyā anvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3423: evetyanena ayaṃ śūdraśabdaḥ śucādravaṇācchūdra iti nairukta eva,
GSP33bbdip13u:3425: ityuṇādisūtreṇa rapratyaye dhātoścadīrghe cakārasya dakārādeśe ca niṣpanno rūḍha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3429: bhāṣye 'saḥ'; iti śrutyanusāreṇa asāviti parokṣeṇoktiśca yuktā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3432: kasmānnimittādasya śoka ityasyottaratayā pravṛttaṃ śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāditisūtrakhaṇḍaṃ vyācaṣṭe - kamvara iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3440: evaṃ vaktuṃ raikva eva yogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3447: tathā ca ityevaṃrūpasya haṃsakṛtānādarabodhakavākyasya haṃsāt svānādaravākyasya vā śravaṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3452: nanu śrutānādarasyāpi rājñaḥ kuḥ śokotpattiḥ jñāyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3463: ityetadvākyārthānyathānupapattyā jñātena raikve vyāsaktamanaskatvena kāryeṇa tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:3465: kāraṇasya kāryāvinābhāvābhāve 'pi kāryasya kāraṇāvinābhāvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3466: asya tadanādarasya śravaṇāt prāptayā śucā'dravaṇameveti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3473: ityasmāt kvipi rūpametat tathātve yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3474: nanu sūtre taddravaṇādityetāvatā pūrtau āṅpraśleṣaḥ kimartha iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:3475: śrutau śūdretivaktavyatve 'pi śokādhikyajñāpanārthaṃ śūdreti ūkārarūpo yo dīrghasvaraḥ śrutaḥ tadarthavyaktavyarthatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3476: na ca śūgdretivaktavye śrutau śūdretyuktiḥ kathamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3483: raikvaṃ prati śīghragamanādeva nimittādasya pautrāyaṇasya śūdratvaṃ śūdreti sambodhitatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:3493: parabuddheḥ śokapadoktaduḥkhānubhavasya apratyakṣatvādityata uktaṃ - sūcyate hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3495: iti vākyārthānupapatyā jñātena tadvyagramanaskatvākhyakāryeṇa tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate'; jñāyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3496: tasmāt ato na śūdreti sambodhanaṃ śūdrasya vedādhikāre liṅgamiti naitadbalācchūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti bhāvaḥ iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati
GSP33bbdip13u:3505: tathā ca pautrāyaṇanidarśanenaiva śūdrasya vedavidyādhikārasiddhirityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - kṣatriyatveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3509: tathā ca uttaratra raikvaṃ prati pautrāyaṇasya ādravaṇāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:3513: pautrāyaṇena dīyamānasya rathasya anyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsāya sūtre caitraratheneti bhāvapradhānapadaṃ prayuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3515: tatra citraścāsau rathaśca citrarathaḥ tasyāyaṃ caitraratha iti vigrahamabhipretya pratyayārthaṃ pradarśayan tadvyācaṣṭe - citrarathasambandhitveneti
GSP33bbdip13u:3525: iti ṣaṣṭhyā itvāśabdārtharathasambandho gamyata iti tasyāśca rathasambandhe śrutirūpatvāt yuktamuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3526: citro ratho yasyeti citrarathastasya bhāvaḥ caitrarathasteneti vyākhyānaṃ tu bhāve 'ṇ pratyayasya kalpyatvāt śrutibhāṣyaviruddhatvācca ayuktam/
GSP33bbdip13u:3527: na ca caitraratheneti sambandhoktimātreṇa kathamanyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsa iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3528: svataḥ prāptatadīyatve bādhakābhāve tadīyatvasyaiva svābhāvikatvasambhave naimittikagrahaṇāyogāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3531: rathena liṅgādityanayossāmānādhikaraṇyāya liṅgāditi pañcamī vyatyayena vyācaṣṭe - liṅganeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3533: kṣatriyatvāvagaterityasya śucā'dravaṇādevāsya śūdratvaṃ na tu rūḍhyeti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3537: liṅgasya śrutitaścaramatvena anekatvena ca prābalyasūcanāya vā caśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3539: evaṃ ca rūḍhereva prābalye 'pyatra śrutānekaliṅgarūpabādhakāt śūdraśabdasya yogavṛttyaṅgīkāra eva yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3544: tadyukto rathaḥ aśvatarīrathaḥ tava dakṣiṇātvena vartate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3547: nanu śrutāvaśvatarīrathaśabdaprayogāt sūtre 'pi tathaiva prayoktavye kathaṃ sūtrakṛt
GSP33bbdip13u:3548: citrarathaśabdaṃ prāyuṅtetyāśaṅkya ubhayorarthaikyānna visaṃvāda ityāśayena tatrābhidhānamāha - ratha iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3553: tathā ca sūtre rathatvaprakārakabodhāya rathaśabdaprayoga iti na tadvaiyarthyamiti dhyeyam iti brāhme uktatvāt na śrutisūtrayorvairūpyamityupaskāreṇānvayaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:3554: yatra vedo rathastatra na vedo yatra no rathaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3556: evaṃ sākṣādeva svābhāvikarathena pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvaṃ prasādhitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3557: svābhāvikarathitve 'sya varṇāvaratvaṃ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkya maivam-āgantukasyāpi rathasya vedaṃ vināyogāt 'vedasya ca saṃskāreti vakṣyamāṇanyāyena śūdre 'yogāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:3558: rathamātreṇa vedānumānadvārā pautrāyaṇasya śūdratvābhāvasiddherityāśayena rathena vedānumāne vyabhicāraśaṅkāparihārāya āgamenobhayavyāptiṃ darśayati - yatreti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3560: tena yatra vahniḥ tatraiva dhūma ityādāviva vedasya vyāpakatālābhaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:3561: ata eva vyatirekapradarśakāṃśe na veda iti vedabhāvasya prathamamuktiḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:3567: vastutastu - yatra rathastatra veda iti yojanāyāṃ nānupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3568: tathā ca anena vyāptiniścayāt na vyabhicāraśaṅketi yādṛśatādṛśarathamātreṇa vedānumānadvārā śūdratvābhāvaniścayānna pautrāyaṇasya vedabāhyavarṇāvaratvaṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3569: etena pūrvapakṣiṇā śūdre 'pi vedāṅgīkārānna tena śūdratvābhāvasādhanaṃ yuktamitinirastaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3571: na ca brāhmaṇādisādhāraṇarathitvenāsya vaidikatvaniścaye 'pi taddvārā aśūdratvasiddhāvapi kathaṃ kṣatriyatvaniścaya iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3573: tasya ca kādācitkarathavati brāhmaṇādāvabhāvāttena sākṣādeva kṣatriyatvaniścayopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3575: ityanena prāptayoddhṛtvānyathānupapattyā śūdrasya rathitvapratītestatra vyabhicāra iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3577: brahmavaivarta ityasya uktatvādityadhyāhāreṇa nāsau śūdra ityanenānvayaḥ iti jñāyata iti śeṣaḥ anena - 'ādravaṇāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:3581: liṅgena svābhāvikarathena liṅgena bahudāyitvādiliṅgena cāsya pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvāvagateḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3584: tathā rathena vedaniścayācca nāsau śūdra iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3593: na ca rathasya vedavyāpyatvācchūdre ca tadabhāvādrathasyāpyabhāva iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3615: kuta evaṃ kalpyata ityataḥ smṛtāvapyupanayanākhyadvitīyajanmavata eva sāraṇyaka vedādhyayanavidhānādityāśayena sūtre bhāṣye ca 'vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ sarahasyo dvijanmanā';
GSP33bbdip13u:3619: 'nāgnirna yajño na kriyā na saṃskāro na vratāniśūdrasya'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:3640: saṃskārābhāve 'pi tāsāmadhikāre śūdrasyāpi tatprāptirityata āha - uttameti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3647: tathā ca śacī yamīūrvaśyādyuttamastrīṇāṃ śūdravanna saṃskārābhāvena vedavidyādhikārasyābhāvo vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3674: tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena hetunā yatsūtre vedādhikārasya abhāva uktaḥ saḥ 'sāmānyena';
GSP33bbdip13u:3679: tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena vedādhikārābhāva iti sāmānyavyāpteḥ śacyādiṣu vidyādhikāradarśanākhyāpavādakena bhaṅge 'pi na śūdrādāvapi tasya bhaṅgaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:3682: strīṇāṃ pradānakarmaiva yathopanayanaṃ tathā / iti smṛteḥ // 36 //
GSP33bbdip13u:3683: evaṃ strīṇāṃ upanayanābhāve 'pi pūrvoktavyāpteḥ sāmānyatvena apavādasambhavādasti vedādhikāra ityuktam/
GSP33bbdip13u:3688: tathā ca puṃsāṃ yathā upanayanaṃ saṃskāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3693: tathā ca uttamastrīṣviha hetūkṛtasya vidhipratinidhisādhāraṇasaṃskārasāmānyābhāvasyābhāvāt na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3694: na ca saṃskāramātrasya vedādhikāraprayojakatve adhamastrīṇāmapi tadāpattiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3696: nanvevamuttamastrīṇāṃ saṃskārayuktatvādeva adhikāritvamiti noktanyāyabhaṅga iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:3697: kimarthaṃ tāsu saṃskārābhāvamaṅgīkṛtya uktanyāyasya sāpavādatvavacanamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:3702: iti tacchabdena pūrvaprakṛtopanayanākhyasaṃskāramātrasya parāmarśādvedaḥ kṛtsna iti
GSP33bbdip13u:3703: smṛteścāsya śūdrasya tadabhāvābhilāpānnāgniriti śrutau saṃskārābhāvābhidhānāt na
GSP33bbdip13u:3704: tasya vedādhikāra iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3709: iti satyavacanena satyakāmasya śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe hāridrumatasya 'naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhati'; (chāṃ.4.5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:3715: iti śrutau tu śūdrasya saṃskārābhāva evocyate na tu asau na kārya iti niṣidhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3716: ato na tadvirodho 'pītyāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - tadabhāveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3720: tadākhyasya ṛṣeḥ etacca pūrvatrottaratra ca sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3722: ityādinā sūtre tacchabdo vyastaḥ anekavibhaktikaḥ buddhyā vivicyāvartate ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3726: śūdratvābhāveti tadabhāvapadavyākhyānena śrutau brāhmaṇaśabdo brahmāṇanayogyatraivarṇikapara ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3727: etadvākyasya yadyayamabrāhmaṇaḥ śūdraḥsyāttarhmetatsatyavacanaṃ ārjavavacanaṃ vāṅmanasayoravairūpyeṇa vacanaṃ vivaktuṃ nārhediti vipakṣe tarkoktirūpatayā,
GSP33bbdip13u:3728: yo 'brāhmaṇaḥ sa evaṃ vaktuṃ nārhati satyavacanahīna iti vyatirekavyāptyuktirūpatayā vā śūdratvābhaāvanirṇāyakatvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3732: tathā cetthaṃ mahāvākyayojanā - satyakāmasya nāhametadvedeti satyavacanena naitadabrāhmaṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:3736: pravṛttatvāt na śūdrasya tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāva iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3738: anena - sūtre taditi vyastaṃ luptavibhaktikaṃ padaṃ samastaṃ ca tantreṇopāttam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3746: satyavacanena manovākkāyakarmaṇāṃ avaiparītyamārjavaṃ tadeva satyatvaṃ tādṛśavacanena tena jñāpitena ṛjutveneti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip13u:3747: naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhatīti vyatirekavyāptiṃ bādhakatarkaṃ copanyasya 'tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe ca';
GSP33bbdip13u:3748: tasya śūdratvābhāvanirṇaye satyeva tadabhāvamanumāyaiva 'samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvāneṣye'; (chāṃ. 4.4.5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:3749: iti tasya tasminnupanayanasaṃskāre tasya gautamasya pravṛtterdarśanācca na śūdrasya tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3750: śūdrasya upanayananiṣedhābhāve kathamayaṃ tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva pravarteta,
GSP33bbdip13u:3751: te jñāyate niṣedho 'stīti bhāva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3752: chāndogye hītthamākhyāyikā - satyakāmo nāma ṛṣiḥ jabālākhyaṃ mātaramupetyovāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:3753: kimiti? ahaṃ vedādhyayanārtham ācāryamupagaccheyaṃ tatrādhyayanasyopanayanasaṃskārasāpekṣatvāt upanayanaṃ vinā te māṃ nādhyāpayeyuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3754: upanayanaṃ ca gotrādyavacane na kuryuḥ ato 'haṃ kiṃ gotro 'smi tadvadeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3755: evamuktā jabālā svaputraṃ satyakāmamabravīt - he tāta tvaṃ yadgotro 'sītyetat nāhaṃ vedeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3758: evamukto gautamaḥ he somya tvaṃ kiṃgotro 'si?
GSP33bbdip13u:3760: evamuktassatyakāmaḥ punargautamaṃ pratyāha - nāhametadveda bho iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3761: bho bhagavan pūjya gautama ahaṃ yadgotro 'smītyetat vedyaṃ 'na veda';
GSP33bbdip13u:3763: evaṃ satyakāmasya satyavacanenārjavaṃ jñātvā punastaṃ pratyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:3773: ato he somya samidhamupahara tvāmupaneṣya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3783: anyathā tena devatādyadhikārasiddhirapi na syāditi śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - śravaṇeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3790: tathā cāniṣiddhatve sati viśiṣṭabuddhyādimattvasyaiva vedādhikāraprayojakatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt tasya ca śūdre abhāvānna tasya devaprativandyā vedādhikāro vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3791: śūdreṇa vedaśravaṇe kṛte sati drutābhyāṃ trapujatubhyāṃ vaṅgalākṣābhyāṃ tatkarṇavivaraparipūraṇaṃ rājabhaṭaiḥ kāryamiti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3796: śrutau śūdreṇa śravaṇe kṛte ityanuktervarṇabāhyaviṣayeyaṃ śrutiḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkānivṛtyarthaṃ sūtre smṛteścetyuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3799: śūdreṇa nāgnissavathā ādhātavyaḥ pañcavidho yajño 'pi nānuṣṭheyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3801: tarhi tenānuṣṭheyaṃ paralokasādhanaṃ kimiti pṛcchati - tu kintviti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3809: iti smṛterityasya śūdrasyaivādhyayananiṣedhāvagamāt na tadabhāva ityadhyāhṛtenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3810: tathā ca spaṣṭasmṛtibalāt śruterapi śūdraviṣayatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3813: nanu śūdrasya vedārthāvadhāraṇāderniṣiddhatve kathaṃ vidurādīnāṃ vaidikārthāvadhāraṇamasti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3814: evaṃ saṃskārarahitānāṃ vedānadhikāre kathaṃ kṣatriyaḥ saṃskārarahitaḥ karṇaḥ nikhilāḥ śrutīradhijagau /
GSP33bbdip13u:3816: avihitopanayanatve sati niṣiddhādhyayanānāṃ uttamastrītiryagādīnāmevāpavādaviṣayatvena niṣiddhādhyayanānāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ atadviṣayatvādityata āha - vidurādīnāmiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3820: janmāntara eva vedātparamparayotpannamaparokṣajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāsteṣāṃ bhāvastattvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3826: kintu apavādaviṣayatvameveti na tatpratibandyetaraśūdrāṇāṃ vedādhikāraḥ śaṅkya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3829: iti spaṣṭaṃ śūdrasyaiva vedādhyayananiṣedhakasmṛteśca na tasya tadabhāvo vedādhyayananiṣedhābhāva iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3832: yadidaṃ kiñca jagatsarvaṃ prāṇa ejati nissṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3837: atra traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti pūrvoktamayuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3839: iti śrutau udyatavajrajñānāt mokṣaḥ śrūyata iti vākyopaskāreṇa yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3840: anena pūrvādhikaraṇe traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti yadabhipretaṃ tasya cānandamayādhikaraṇe 'netaraḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:3841: ityanenoktasya mokṣajanakajñānaviṣayatvasya viṣṇoranyatrākṣepāt tenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3845: iti śrutau ca āyudhe prasiddhodyatatvaliṅgabalāccendrāyudhamevedaṃ vajramiti sayuktikapūrvapakṣaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3848: prāṇa ityasya nimittasaptamītvaṃ vā vibhaktivipariṇāmaṃ vā āśritya āvṛttyā nissṛtamityanenāpi sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3853: prāṇanānnimittāt prāṇaśabdavācye harau sthitaṃ prāṇānnissṛtaṃ tato jātaṃ ca taditaṃ sarvaṃ jagat 'yasmādejati';
GSP33bbdip13u:3865: yadvā - prāṇa iti prathamāntaṃ padaṃ tathā ca prāṇo mukhyaprāṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3866: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kiñcānyacchrutaṃ sarvaṃ jagacca yasmānnissṛtaṃ yasmādejati ca tadetadvajraṃ ye vidurityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3872: tathā ca yatkiñcijjagatsarvaṃ yadyasmānnissṛtaṃ sa mukhyaprāṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3874: atra prathamavyākhyāne mukhyaprāṇasya jagadantargatatvena bhagavatpreryatvaṃ dvitīye jagatsāmyena,
GSP33bbdip13u:3875: tṛtīye tu mukhyaprāṇasyaiva sākṣādbhagavatpreryatvaṃ jagatastu mukhyaprāṇapreryatvamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3888: na ca śrutau vākyabhedāṅgīkāre kampakatvaṃ vajre nocyata iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3890: udyatavajra iti sūtre śeṣoktiḥ samanvayasūtrādanuvṛttasya tadityasyoddeśyavajrapadānusārātprāṇapadānusārādvā bhagavāniti vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3899: nanu śrutiliṅgābhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa nirṇaya ityato liṅgasya niravakāśatvādevetyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:3901: sāmānyato jagacceṣṭakatvaliṅgasya viṣṇoranyatraniravakāśatvaṃ śrutyā darśayati - kohīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3902: hiśabdo hetau yata ityarthe prasiddhau vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3904: ato liṅgasya nānyatra sāvakāśatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3906: yadā sāmānyataḥ sarvajagacceṣṭakatvameva viṣṇvekaniṣṭhaṃ tadā kimu vaktavyaṃ śruteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:3908: jagacceṣṭakatvasya sarvathānyatrāyogāditi bhāvena tatra śrutiṃ darśayati - prāṇasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3914: tasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatvāsiddhiparihārāya tatra śrutiṃ pramāṇayati - prāṇasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3923: śruteḥ prathamavyākhyāyāmapi kaimutyavyaktikaraṇāya śrutyuktaprāṇaceṣṭakatvaṃ hetūkṛtya pravṛttāṃ smṛtimāha - nabhasvata iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3927: tadā kimutānyasya preryasya vāyubhinnasya jagataśceṣṭā harerbhavantīti vaktavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3928: kuta etat? yato yasya jagataḥ ceṣṭā nabhasvato na bhavantyata iti vacanārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3936: prabalatvācca kathaṃ niravakāśenāpi sarvaceṣṭakatvaliṅgena vajro viṣṇureveti nirṇaya
GSP33bbdip13u:3949: tataḥ kim, eṣa iti ca kaḥ ityata āha - hetīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3952: hetīnāṃ cakrādisarvāyudhānāṃ yāni nāmāni mukhyavācyatayā tadvānityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3958: tena varjanādityuktayogasya rūḍherdairbalyāt ayoga iti nirastam/
GSP33bbdip13u:3959: na caivaṃ kāṭhakabhāṣye - vajravadbhayadaṃ ceti vajraśabdasya viṣṇau gauṇatvoktivirodha iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3967: tatra 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjotiḥ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ. 6.3.7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3971: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca darśayati - hṛdaya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3973: nihitaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyaṃ sa paramātmeti jyotirnaye abhihitamityarthaḥ /
