GSP33bbdip13u:3974: tataḥ kimityata āha - tatreti jyotirviṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3979: tathā cātra śrutaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyo jñānātmako jīva eveti pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3983: iti vājasaneyavākyoktajyotiṣo viṣṇutvākṣepamukhena pūrvoktasyāpi tadākṣepāttenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ uktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3987: kiṃjñānasādhanaḥ jīvasya jñānasādhanaṃ kimiti janakena pṛṣṭo yājñyavalkyaḥ 'ādityajyotissamrāḍiti hovāca'; (bṛ. 6.3.2.)
GSP33bbdip13u:3995: iti jyotiṣṭvenokta ātmā katamaḥ kīdṛśa iti pṛṣṭo 'yo 'yam';
GSP33bbdip13u:4008: ātmapadaṃ sa iti padaṃ ca jīvaparaṃ ubhayalokasañcaraṇamapi karmādhīnaṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4042: tathā ca liṅgaṃ sāvakāśamiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4044: prakarṣeṇa āsamantāt jñena prajña eva prājñaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4046: adhiṣṭhito jīvamāruhya gacchati bhagavāniti bṛhadbhāṣyokteḥ tadvāhanabhūtaḥ 'utsarjat';
GSP33bbdip13u:4064: anenātratyākāśaśabdasya viṣṇvanyatvaparatvoktimukhena pūrvoktasarvādhāratvasyāpi anyaniṣṭhatvākṣepāttenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4069: tathā ca chandogyaśrutyuktaḥ ākāśaḥ prasiddhaḥ sākṣisiddhaḥ avyākṛtākāśa evāṅgīkāryaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4072: iti vacanāt avakāśasyāpi nāmarūpavattvāditi candrikākṛdabhipretaṃ ṭīkāpāṭhamāśritya
GSP33bbdip13u:4082: yadvā - tacchabdena vācyaprapañcāntarbhūtaṃ nīlādirūpaṃ vācakaṃ nāma ca gṛhyate/
GSP33bbdip13u:4085: sākalyena nāmavācyaṃ prākṛtarūparahitaṃ ca yadvartate tadbrahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4088: yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - nāmi ca rūpi ca yannabhavati tadbrahmeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4100: tathā ca tābhyāṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ anyaḥ arthaḥ arthāntaraṃ yadvā tābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ arthāntaraḥ tasya bhāvastattvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4104: yadvā - nirapekṣayoreva nāmarūparāhityayorākāśasya brahmatvasādhakatvāt arthāntarapadena rūparāhityaṃ ādipadena nāmarāhityaṃ ca gṛhyate/
GSP33bbdip13u:4114: ākāśe śrutena nāmarūpatvādiliṅgena kuto viṣṇutvaniścaya ityatastasya tanniṣṭhatvāditibhāvena tatra pramāṇatayā ātharvaṇīṃ śrutimāha - avarṇamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:4123: ityādiśruterityasya tasya viṣṇoretadarūpatvādikaṃ lakṣaṇamasādhāraṇadharma iti jñāyate ityadhyāhāreṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4124: hi yasmāttasmāt na liṅgasya vyadhikaraṇāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4132: tathāpi vācakasya nāmno vācyāpekṣayāprādhānyāt vācyasyaiva pradhānatvādvācyaprapañcāntargatarūparāhityaśrutireva prathamamudāhṛtetyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4151: tacca 'sa yattatra kiñcitpaśyananvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ.6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4164: tataḥ kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4168: kutaḥ taddraṣṭṛtvasya loke jīva eva prasiddhatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4170: iti tacchabdena 'sa vā eṣa etasmin samprasāde ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ prati yonyā dravati svapnāyaiva'; (bṛ. 6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4176: ramaṇaṃ kṛtvā jīvagataṃ puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva na tvanubhūya 'caritvā';
GSP33bbdip13u:4191: pūrvapakṣī tu śrautatacchabdena jīvaṃ gṛhītvā sarvaṃ vākyaṃ jīvaparatayā vyākhyāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4196: 'prājñenātmanā sampariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram';
GSP33bbdip13u:4202: tena sūtre uddeśyavidheyapratipattyartham anuvṛttāvṛttasya tacchabdasya vipariṇāmassūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4203: tacchabdena gṛhītasyāpi samanvetavyaliṅgasya spaṣṭapratipattyarthaṃ svaśabdena nirdeśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4206: asaṅga ityapi hetusūcanāya sūtre adhyāhṛtaṃ padam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4207: jīvaḥ para ityanena suṣuptyutkrāntipadaṃ tatprakaraṇalakṣakamapi jīvaparamātmaparamapītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4209: utkrāntiśabdaḥ dehādutkrāmayitṛparaḥ tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ tasya paramātmana eva bhavet na jīvasya /
GSP33bbdip13u:4211: na ca svapnādidraṣṭuḥ asaṅgatvaśravaṇe 'pi kuto 'yaṃ viṣṇuriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4212: yato 'yamasaṅgaḥ karmābaddhatvāt paraḥ paramātmaiva na jīvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4213: tathā ca liṅgasya niravakāśatvāt nāprayojakatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4214: na ca jīve 'pir iśvarabhedena asaṅgatvoktiḥ sambhavatīti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4216: prājñeneti śrutyudāharaṇena sūtre suṣuptipadaṃ mokṣasyāpi grāhakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4217: tenāyaṃ bhedo vyāvahārika iti śaṅkānirāso 'pi bhavati/
GSP33bbdip13u:4218: suṣuptyutkrāntipadena ca tatprakaraṇaṃ lakṣyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4223: samāśliṣṭaḥ supto muktaśca dehādbāhyamāntaraṃ ca kiñcana viṣayādikaṃ na vedeti prathamavākyārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4227: nanu kathamaśarīrasya svāpnādidarśanaṃ yuktaṃ syādityata āha - svapnādīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4231: tathā ca na kevalamasaṅgatvaṃ karmābaddhatvāt parasyaiva yujyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:4234: ataḥ tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ yujyate na jīvasya/
GSP33bbdip13u:4236: satyāśeṣārthajñatvāt svapnapadārthānāṃ jīvagatāvasthāyāśca satyatāyā vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4239: na ca 'dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca'; (bṛ.6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4241: yato 'tra ādipadagṛhītaṃ puṇyapāpādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ liṅgāntaraṃ ca tasyaiva yujyate ata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4252: ata eva svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ ca tasyaiva vaktuṃ yujyate na jīvasyeti sūtrārthaḥ ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4260: devānāṃ ca vidyākarmaṇoḥ padaprāptiḥ sūcitā taduparyapīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4262: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - eṣa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4265: na kevalaṃ viṣṇoḥ api tu kasyacit brāhmaṇasyāpītyaperarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4266: idaṃ ca yo janmādyadhikaraṇeṣu viṣṇorananyāpekṣayā jagatsraṣṭṛtvoktyā abhisaṃhito nityamahimā saḥ 'eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:4267: iti vākye brāhmaṇasyāpi pratīyata iti yattacchabdādhyāhāreṇa yojyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4268: anena pūrvābhisaṃhitanityamahimatvasya viṣṇoranyasyāpyākṣepāt janmādyadhikaraṇaiḥ phalamukhena asyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4270: yadvā - devānāmiti vākyaṃ devatādhikaraṇapratipādyānuvādaparatvenāpi vyākhyāya tenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4272: iti sūtreṇa devānāṃ viriñcādyamarāṇāṃ vidyākarmaṇossakāśāt sādhyā yā nityapadaprāptiruktā, sā na yuktā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4278: tathā ca brāhmaṇasya viṣṇoreṣaḥ pūrvoktamahimā nityaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4279: kuto? yato 'yaṃ 'na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān'; (bṛ.6.4.22.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4281: pāpakarmaṇā tatphalena duḥkhena na hrasate iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4293: taduparīti sūtre devānāṃ vidyākarmabhyāṃ padaprāpteḥ samarthitatvena brāhmaṇe śrutanityamahimatvasya viriñce asambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:4297: tathā ca taduparīti sūtre viriñcetaradevānāmeva vidyākarmaṇoḥ sakāśāt padaprāptiḥ 'sūcitā';
GSP33bbdip13u:4300: tasyeśvararūpatvena devakoṭyapraviṣṭatvādato viriñcasya nityamahimattvaṃ yuktameveti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4305: 'sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvasyeśānaḥ ... sa vā eṣa neti neti'; (bṛ. 6.4.21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4308: vājasaneyake sarvavaśitvavāciśabdasyaivāditvātsūtrasya tadvisaṃvādamāśaṅkya tatparihārāya sūtrānukūlatayā sadṛśaśākhāntaragatavākyodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - sarvasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4309: 'sarvasya'; brahmarudrādeḥ sakāśāt guṇairadhikaścāsau sarvasya patiḥ pālakaśceti sarvādhipatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4311: brahmādīnāṃ anaḥ preraka iti sarvasyeśāna iti śrutyantarārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4312: sarvavaśiśabdārthastu sarvamasya vaśe yasmāddhariḥ sarvavaśī tata iti bṛhadbhāṣyādavagantavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4321: kuta ityataḥ 'ātmāgṛhyo na hi gṛhyate 'śīryo na hi śīryate 'saṅgo na hi sajjate 'sito na vyathate na riṣyati.........sa eṣa ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayaḥ'; (bṛ. 2.4.24.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4323: atrāgṛhya ityādirātmana iti netyuktārthe sākalyena agrāhyatvādirūpahetusamarpakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4333: ityādau śrutāḥ ye sarvādhipatyādivācakāḥ śabdāḥ tebhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4337: evaṃ hetuṃ vyākhyāya sūtre samanvayasūtrāt tattvityanuvartya vipariṇamyamānena tadityanenānvayayogyamuddeśyasamarpakaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:4338: nityamahimeti padaṃ cādhyāhṛtyāhatya niṣkṛṣṭāṃ pratijñāṃ darśayati - nityamahimeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4340: śabdebhya iti hetvanvayayogyaṃ sādhyaṃ tu brāhmaṇa ityadhyāhṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4345: tathā ca nityamahimāpi sa eveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4348: nanu sarvādhipatyādivāciśabdasadbhāve 'pi kuto brāhmaṇasya viṣṇutvaniścaya ityaprayojakatavaśaṅkāvāraṇāya tatra sarvādhipitvasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatve tāvacchrutimāha - uteti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4356: kutaḥ? yato yasmāt na kevalamamuktasarvādhipatiḥ puruṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4363: mokṣasyar iśāna iti ceti arthāntaraṃ coktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4370: muktāvanadhīnatve sarvajñasya buddhimataḥ svādhīnasaṃsāribhyo mokṣapradānāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4384: 'hi'; yasmātte sarvādhipatyādiśabdāḥ ityavagatāḥ tasmāt nāprayojakatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
